The weighting reflects the proportion of each country's total population that is affected by particular social policies. In 2011, the social justice index in Turkey was 3.9 points.

This statistic shows the average inflation rate in Russia from 1996 to 2020, with projections up until 2026. In 2020, the average inflation rate in Russia was at about 4.38 percent compared to the previous year.

This statistic displays the results of a survey fielded in the United Kingdom in 2012 concerning social network usage. Individuals were asked at what age they had first used a social network. The majority of respondents reported using social networks from 16 to 24 years of age, with a total of 90 percent of respondents in this age bracket reporting having used a social network.
The chart shows the proportion of chemical companies worldwide that reported on social responsibility issues in 2009, by topic.
This statistic shows the share of foreign trade with selected countries of China's foreign trade partners in 2013. In 2013, China's share of foreign trade with Germany amounted to 7.7 percent.

This statistic shows the share of individuals in EU5 countries and the EU-27 who accessed online services via mobile device in 2012. In the United Kingdom, 44 percent of individuals accessed online services via mobile device.
The statistic shows dishwasher and dishwasher-related shipments in the United States from 2013 to 2017. In 2017, 8.01 dishwashers were shipped in the United States.

This statistic presents the percentage of apps used only once after their installation from 2012 to 2019. During the most recent survey period, it was found that mobile apps were only accessed once after their installation a total of 25 percent of the time.

In 2016, the Western Pacific Region had the highest number of stroke cases worldwide, with around 13.7 million. The Eastern Mediterranean Region had the second highest number of stroke cases, with around 5.8 million. This statistic shows the number of incident cases of stroke worldwide in 2016, by region.
The statistic shows the number of students per computer in Arab countries in 2008. In 2008, there were 17 students per computer in Jordan.
The graph shows the percentage of schools in the Americas with internet access between 1999 and 2009. In 1999, only 0.1 percent of schools in the Americas provided internet access.
The graph shows the monthly inflation rate in China from January 2020 to January 2022. In January 2022, the inflation rate in China was at 0.9 percent.

The statistic represents the global number of Bosch employees as of 2020, with a breakdown by region. The Germany-based multinational engineering and electronics company employed 132,900 people in Germany.
This statistic gives information on the average time spent on various smartphone content usage per month. In January 2011, users spent an average of 677 minutes per month on mobile messaging.

The chart illustrates the distribution of data volumes across different mobile networks. Laptop networks handle 30.1% of the data volume, more than smartphone networks which handle 35.6%. Interestingly, smartphone networks also handle the most data volume at 47.9%.

This statistic shows the average inflation rate in Australia from 1986 to 2020, with projections up until 2026. In 2020, the average inflation rate in Australia amounted to about 1.44 percent compared to the previous year.

This statistic shows the ranking of the most expensive cities for business travel in 2011. The ranking is based on the cost of daily expenses including : hotel, car and food/lunch for business travelers. In 2011, the most expensive city for business travel was New York with total daily costs of 561 U.S. dollars.

This statistic displays the share of respondents that uploaded content to social media via smartphone in the United Kingdom in 2013, by location. In 2013, it was found that 49 percent of respondents reported uploading social media content from a caf and/or a pub/restaurant.
The net income of Allianz Group fluctuated from 2005 to 2020. In 2020, the net income of Allianz Group amounted to approximately 7.1 billion euros.

As of March 2020, almost one fifth of consumers in the United States reported that they would be much more likely to go to a shopping mall in the event that the coronavirus were to spread to their community. In comparison, almost half of consumers stated that they would be much less likely to go to a shopping mall in this circumstance.
The ranking shows the number of subscribers for different mobile network operators worldwide in 2010. T-Mobile had the most subscribers in 2010 with 560 million
The statistic shows the percentage of mobile social gaming users worldwide as of January 2011. It was found that 30 percent of mobile social gamers were located in Europe.
This statistic shows the number of overnight stays in Germany from Asian source markets in 2010 and 2020. In 2020, the number of overnight stays from China and Hong Kong amounted to 2.2 million.

This statistic shows the average monthly household spend on mobile services in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2007 to 2017. In 2017, the average monthly household spend on mobile services was 46 British pounds.

This statistic shows the median number of Twitter followers of non-profit organizations in the United States in 2016, by sector. In the measured period, Twitter profiles of nonprofit organizations in the health sector had a median number of 18.8 thousand followers.

This statistic displays the number of employees at McKesson Europe - formerly known as Celesio AG - from 2006 to 2018. In 2018, the company employed 25,922 people. McKesson Europe operates in 14 countries and is headquartered in Stuttgart, Germany.
This statistic shows the number of employees of Penguin Random House from 2005 to 2020. In 2020, 11,020 people were employed by the company worldwide, up from 10,328 in the previous year.

This statistic shows the leading German-based biotechnology companies in 2017, by number of employees. With 4,639 employees, Qiagen N.V. was the largest of the biotechnology companies based in Germany.

In December 2021, Sony's PlayStation Network had 110.5 million monthly active users worldwide. This figure is up from the previous month's total of 104.1 million MAU. The PlayStation Network is an online video game service associated with Sony's PlayStation line of consoles.

The chart presents a comparison of child mortality rates in different continents for the years 2019 and 2100. It is observed that in 2019, the continent with the highest child mortality rate was Asia with a rate of 4600, followed by Africa with 1200, Europe with 800, North America with 400, South America with 500, Central America with 200, and Oceania with 60. However, in 2100, the situation changes. North America becomes the continent with the highest child mortality rate with 600, Asia drops to the second position with 2900, Africa increases to 4300, Europe falls to 705, South America slightly increases to 510, Central America also increases to 250, and Oceania maintains at 65.
In 2022, Poles will spend more on keeping their homes warm than in the previous year. The cost of gas for heating is expected to increase by 58 percent, and electricity costs by 24 percent.

The coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) outbreak and the need for a home office implementation contributed to the increase in the average ticket price in Russian movie theaters on March 19, 2020. Namely, the average price rose by 44 percent compared to the previous weekend.

This survey shows the public opinion of Americans towards Russia from 1999 to 2013. In 1999, 47 percent of Americans considered Russia an ally of the United States, while 33 percent thought it was an adversary. In 2013, 43 percent of Americans considered Russia an ally, while 51 percent thought it was an adversary.

The statistic reflects the opinion of surveyed Americans on the question if Syria does not give up chemical weapons, and if the U.S. and its allies would launch airstrikes against Syria in response. 49 percent of respondents oppose any military action in response to Syria's use of chemical weapons.
The chart shows the percentage of households in selected countries who have a personal computer. In the United States, 85 percent of households have a PC.

In the third fiscal quarter of 2022, which ended on December 31, 2021, video game publisher Electronic Arts ( EA ) reported a net income of 99 million U.S. dollars. This marks a significant increase from the net loss of 222 million U.S. dollars that the company recorded in the second quarter of 2021.

The statistic shows a comparison of the results of a survey among Americans in 2011 and in 2013 on the reaons for mass shootings. They were asked how much they think the spread of extremist viewpoints on the Internet is responsible for these shootings. In January 2011, 41 percent of respondents said the spread of extremist viewpoints on the Internet was to blame a `` great deal '' for these shootings. In 2013, 40 percent of respondents said the same.

The statistic shows the average new car delivery times in Japan in 2011, by manufacturer and type of delivery. In 2011, the average new car delivery time from the Toyota Motor Corporation in Japan was 4.8 hours for a standard delivery.

The statistic shows the percentage of taxes and social security contributions of the annual gross salary of a employed person with a average income and no children living in a OECD country in 2013. The tax and social security contributions in Sweden in 2013 amounted to 50.8 percent of the annual gross salary of an employed person with average income and no children living in the country.

This statistic shows a forecast about the migration balance for immigrants in developed regions from 2015 to 2050. From 2015 to 2020, the net migration balance is expected to be about 14.1 million people. This figure is expected to be 11.3 million between 2020 and 2025.

In 2019, the number of employees at Beiersdorf AG was 17,934. Beiersdorf AG is a multinational corporation based in Hamburg, Germany, manufacturing products for personal care. The Beiersdorf Group comprises the brands Beiersdorf, Bora, and Nivea.

The statistic shows the 15 countries with the highest political instability in the period 2009/2010. With a political instability score of 8.8, Afghanistan was the country with the world's largest political instability in 2009/2010.
This statistic shows the share of population over the age of 65 in selected European countries in 2019. In 2019, approximately 18 percent of the population in Germany were over the age of 65.

The statistic shows the ranking of the countries with the highest political stability in the period 2009/2010. With a score of 3.61, Norway was the country with the world's highest political stability in 2009/2010.

This statistic displays the share of mobile internet users in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2009 and 2013, by gender. In 2013, it was found that 48 percent of female internet users accessed the internet via a mobile device.

The statistic depicts the exports of orange juice concentrate from Brazil by export region in 2009. Brazil exported orange juice concentrate to the European Union's 27 countries ( EU-27 ) worth a total of 66.5 million U.S. dollars in 2009.

This statistic shows data on the global revenue of the German company Essilor from 2008 to 2020. In 2020, Essilor had a global revenue of approximately 6.8 billion euros. Essilor had revenues of 3.02 billion euros in 2008.
In 2020, Airbus'operating revenue amounted to around 53.5 billion euros, compared with just under 36 billion euros in 2019. The company's EBIT dropped by some 20 percent between 2019 and 2020.

In 2020, more people died in natural disasters in Europe than in any other continent. In Europe, 42.9 percent of fatalities from natural disasters occurred in 2020. In comparison, 40.1 percent of fatalities from natural disasters occurred in Asia.

This statistic shows a comparison of the gross domestic product ( GDP ) and the national debt in selected euro countries in 2020. In 2020, Italy's GDP amounted to approximately 1.9 trillion euros, while its national debt amounted to approximately 2.6 trillion euros.
The statistic shows the median wealth of US lawmakers in Congress from 2004 to 2010, by party. In 2010, the median wealth of a Republican member of Congress was 0.88 million U.S. dollars.

This statistic displays the share of individuals using computers in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2004 and 2017, by age and gender. In 2017, 94 percent of women aged between 16 and 74 years used computers.
The statistic shows the reinsurance losses of Munich Re from natural disasters from 2008 to 2020. In 2020, the reinsurance losses of Munich Re due to natural disasters amounted to 1.1 billion euros.

Rates of online purchase of household goods in Cyprus have remained relatively low, hovering around 4 to 5 percent since 2016. 2019 saw the highest percentage of individuals to have purchased household goods online in Cyprus with 9 percent.

This statistic gives information on the time spent on various app categories on iOS and Android devices in South Korea in 2013. During a survey, it was found that Android users spent an average of 51 percent of their time on business apps.

The statistic shows the ratio of government expenditure to gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Spain from 2016 to 2020, with projections up until 2026. In 2020, government expenditure in Spain amounted to about 52.19 percent of the country's gross domestic product.

In 2021, Rome was by far the largest city in Italy, with 2.8 million inhabitants, followed by Milan, with 1.4 million inhabitants. If compared with the number of citizens in 2012, the resident population of Rome increased of over one million individuals over the six-year period of time.

The statistic presents the distribution of the workforce across economic sectors in Mexico from 2009 to 2019. In 2019, 12.6 percent of the workforce in Mexico were employed in agriculture, 25.1 percent in industry and 62.3 percent in services.

The statistic shows the U.S. market share of energy drink beverages and shots in 2012. In that year, energy drinks were estimated to hold a share of 78 percent of the energy drink beverages and shots market.

In 2019, the hydroelectric production in North America amounted to some 738 gigawatt hours. In that same year, the global production of electricity from hydropower was estimated at approximately 8.66 trillion kilowatt hours.
This statistic depicts the total retail sales of Sears Holdings from 2005 to 2020. In 2020, Sears Holdings generated total retail sales amounting to about five and a half billion U.S. dollars.

This statistic presents the gross value added ( GVA ) by self-employment in the hospitality and tourism industry in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2008 to 2011. The GVA from this sector increased from 619.2 million British pounds in 2008 to 843.2 million British pounds in 2010.
The chart shows the gross value added ( GVA ) by tourist services in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2008 to 2011. The GVA from tourism increased from 2008 to 2010 but decreased in the following year.

This statistic shows the share of organic sales in Great Britain in 2012, by social grouping. Organic food and non-food products were most popular with the AB social group, where 38 percent of respondents reported purchasing such products.

Rates of online purchase of household goods in Latvia have remained relatively stable since 2016, ranging between 18 and 21 percent. The percentage of individuals to have purchased household goods online in 2019 was 21 percent, the highest over the period of time in consideration.

This statistic displays the results of a survey on the location of internet usage in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2005 to 2015. In 2012, it was found that 49 percent of respondents reported using the internet at home and elsewhere, while 25 percent reported using the internet only at home.
The graph shows data on the desire to see the Super Bowl ads in Canada from 2012 to 2014. During a survey, 53 percent of respondents stated they were hoping to see Super Bowl ads in 2014.

This statistic shows the average age in years of light commercial vehicles ( LCVs ) on the road in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2007 and 2015. The average age of the vehicles can give an idea about how often people are buying new cars, so the older the average vehicle, the longer people are sticking with their old cars rather than buying new ones. Thus the number of people holding on to their aging LCVs wa projected to steadily increase.

This statistic displays the results of a survey fielded in the United Kingdom in 2014 concerning the hours of internet use per week, by gender and location. In 2014, 13.6 hours of weekly internet use was reported by male respondents, of which 6.8 hours was at home and 6.2 hours at a workplace or place of education.

This statistic shows the share of part-time employees in the hospitality and tourism sector in the United Kingdom ( UK ) by industry in 2011. 45 percent of employees in pubs, bars and nightclubs were on a part-time basis.

The statistic shows the most expensive cities to buy a Club Sandwich worldwide as of May 2014. In 2014, the most expensive city to buy a Club Sandwich was New York City, United States, with a Sandwich Price of 32.74 U.S. dollars.

This statistic shows the games with the longest average video game session time on the launch platform Raptr in 2013. Raptr users played their longest sessions without a break while playing Black Flag on the Xbox 360. The longest average session time for all games on Raptr was 3.14 hours.

The value of fixed income funds under management in the United Kingdom ( UK ) increased overall from January 2020 to December 2021. As of December 2021, the value of fixed income funds was approximately 321 billion British pounds ( GBP ).

This statistic illustrates the net value of retail sales of overseas funds in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from May 2014 to November 2015. It can be seen that the net value of retail sales of overseas funds fluctuated during the period under observation, reaching a value of negative 554 million British pounds as of November 2015. The largest net value of retail sales of overseas funds during this period was found in October 2015, when net sales of overseas funds reached a value of 1.4 billion British pounds.

This statistic illustrates the total value of overseas funds under management in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from May 2014 to November 2015. It can be seen that the total value of overseas funds under management fluctuated during the period under observation, reaching a value of approximately 89.6 billion British pounds as of November 2015. The smallest value of overseas funds under management was found in June 2014, when a total of approximately 71.9 billion British pounds was recorded.

According to a survey conducted to understand the impact of the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) on Indian businesses, over 30 percent of respondents indicated that they are not able to reduce costs in the current situation. Survey respondents included members belonging to Indian private and public corporate sectors and multinational companies.

This statistic shows the political parties and their respective results at the European Parliament Elections in Northern Ireland ( NI ) in 2014. In 2014, the European Conservatives and Reformists ( ECR ) had 25.4 percent of the votes.

This survey shows the proportion of accommodation and food premises experiencing crime in England and Wales in 2014, by incident type. In the 12 months prior to survey, approximately 13,000 premises experienced a burglary attack.

This survey shows the proportion of arts, entertainment and recreation premises experiencing crime in England and Wales in 2013, by type of crime. In the 12 months prior to survey, 20 percent of premises experienced burglaries ( including attempts ), making it the most common form of crime experienced by arts, entertainment and recreation businesses.

This survey shows the number of crime incidents experienced at agriculture, forestry and fishing premises in England and Wales in 2018, by business size. In the 12 months prior to survey, agricultural businesses with one to nine employees experienced a total of 72,000 crime incidents, making them the most targeted sector.

This statistic shows the number of vehicles which were excluded from duty in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2015/16 and 2016/17, by reason. The largest number of vehicles excluded from duty in the UK in the financial year of 2015/16 were due to the owners not having light goods vehicles registered. In that same year, over 1,000 buses and coaches were also excluded from duty.

This survey shows the reasons businesses gave for not reporting cases of burglary with entry on their premises to the police in England and Wales in 2014. Of respondents, 52 percent said they dealt with the incident themselves without the need to report to the police.

This survey shows the reasons businesses gave for not reporting online crime to the police in England and Wales in 2012/2014. Of respondents, 39 percent said they did not report the crime due to lack of police engagement, such as believing the police could not have done anything, would not be interested or had not done anything in the past.

This statistic shows the use of computer, smartphone, and tablet among U.S. employees. The survey shows that 88 percent of the respondents use a computer, 82 percent use a smartphone, and 49 percent use a tablet.

This statistic shows the total annual expenditure on food purchases in the United Kingdom from 2005 to 2020, based on volume. In 2020, UK households purchased approximately 102 billion British pounds worth of food, an increase on the previous year.

This statistic shows the total annual expenditure on coffee, tea and cocoa purchases in the United Kingdom from 2005 to 2020, based on volume. In 2020, UK households purchased approximately four billion British pounds worth of coffee, tea and cocoa, showing a gradual annual increase since 2014.
From 2016 to 2019, the rates of online purchase of household goods in Poland have been steadily increasing, from 20 per cent in 2016 to 25 per cent in 2019.

This statistic shows the number of new buses registered in Great Britain between 2006 and 2018, by body type. The majority of new buses registered were single deck buses. The number of single deck buses registered peaked at 3.5 million in 2006, before declining in the following years. However, the number of double deck buses registered has increased since 2012, and reached 1.25 million in 2018.

This graph represents the main reasons why people use buses in London, based on percentages of total bus boardings from a 2009 to 2012 four year average. Shopping is the second most common reason, with 19 percent of all bus trips taken for this reason.

This statistic shows the total annual expenditure on health in the United Kingdom from 2005 to 2020, based on volume. In 2020, UK households bought approximately 21.3 billion British pounds worth of health products and services, including medical and pharmaceutical products and hospital and out-patient services.

This statistic shows the share of travelers from the United States who would drive in a foreign country on the opposite side of the road as of May 2014. During the survey, 66 percent of respondents from the United States said they would be willing to drive in a foreign country on the opposite side of the road.

This graph shows the satisfaction of bus users and non-users with bus destinations in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2013. The greatest share of bus users were very satisfied with their bus destinations, at 71 percent, and the smallest share of bus non-users were very satisfied with their destinations, at 11 percent.

This statistic shows staff training types in the hospitality and tourism industry in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2011. 85 percent of employers surveyed reported providing on-the-job training, while 42 percent also provided management training.

This statistic shows the rate of heart attacks in men with and without post-stroke thrombolytics ( t-pill ) therapy, by age group, according to the TIMI-SSC study in 2014. The age groups were divided into : all ages, age over 65 years, age under 65 years. The rate of heart attacks in the age group of all ages was 3.5 per 1,000 per year.

This statistic shows the impact of the economy on the likelihood of travel among United States travelers from 2012 to 2015. During the survey in 2014, 52 percent of respondents said that the economy had no impact on their likelihood to travel.

This statistic shows the opinions of air travelers on certain aspects of air travel as of April 2014. During the survey, 75 percent of respondents said they were convinced that airlines would overcharge passengers for checked luggage.

This statistic shows the most popular United States destinations for Canadian travelers in 2014. During the survey, 29 percent of the respondents stated that Florida was their favorite U.S. destination for Canadian travelers in 2014.
On May 31, some 33 percent of respondents in the United States stated that they are satisfied or very satisfied with the government's response to the pandemic.

This statistic shows the number of used Nissan cars sold in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2010 and 2014. Although Nissan car sales were quite steady for the first four years, sales of used cars have grown significantly from 2010 to 2014. In 2014 over 255 thousand used Nissan cars were sold in the UK.

This statistic shows the number of used Volkswagen sold in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2010 and 2014. Despite being one of the most popular car makes in the UK, the number of second-hand units sold was declining. This trend was reversed in 2013, when used Volkswagen sales increased to 544,000 units.
This statistic shows the slowest growing luxury watch brands worldwide in 2012 and 2013. In 2013, the slowest growing luxury watch brand was Omega with a growth rate of -25.8 percent.

This statistic shows the number of used cars sold in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2013 according to car segment type. As with new cars, the SUV segment was the most popular type of used car with more than 461 thousand units sold. The least popular segment was luxury cars with only 42 thousand used units sold.

This statistic shows the number of used SUVs sold in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2010 and 2013. The popularity of used SUVs in the UK was increasing even though the number of used car sales was still relatively low. In 2013 almost 489,000 thousand used SUVs were sold in the UK.

This statistic shows the amount of money spent on pro and contra care TV ads from 2010 to 2014. In the four years, about 420 million U.S. dollars were spent on TV ads for under-dermatological products.

This statistic shows the number of used luxury cars sold in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2010 and 2013. Due to being a specialist and expensive type of car, the number of second-hand units sold was low and continues to fall within the specified time period. In 2013 over 41,000 units were sold in comparison with almost 46,000 in 2010.
This statistic shows the most visited tourist attractions worldwide as of April 2014. Each year, 22.5 million people visit Niagara Falls.

This statistic shows the most popular destinations for North American honeymooners as of 2014. The most popular destination for North American honeymooners was Latin America and the Caribbean, with 67 percent of respondents choosing to go there for their honeymoon.

This bar chart illustrates the average speed of different vehicles on dual carriageways in Great Britain in 2014, in mph. All vehicles have an average speed within the specified range with buses, coaches, and articulated HGVs tending to be the slowest.
As of May 31, some 48 percent of respondents in the United States stated that they are more careful about their personal hygiene as a result of the pandemic.

This bar chart shows the average speed of different vehicles on various types of roads in Great Britain in 2014. All vehicles had an average speed on motorways that was higher than the speed limit. Motorcycles were the fastest vehicles on all the roads with an average speed of 67 mph. Cars towing and most heavy goods vehicles had an average speed between 40 and 50 mph.

This statistic displays the distribution of headache consultations at primary-care physicians worldwide as of 2011, by headache disorder type. As of that year, more than one third of all headache-related visits to a primary-care physician were due to migraine.

The chart shows the combined debt of South Korea's largest ships from 2009 to 2012. In 2012, the debt amounted to around 21.4 trillion South Korean won. According to the source, the ship operator Hyundai Merchant Marine had debts of over 20 trillion South Korean won in total.

This statistic is based on a survey and shows the percentage of people in various regions of the world who prefer alternative or complementary therapies to traditional medicine in 2011. In South-East Asia, 80 percent of people prefer alternative therapies.

This line graph shows the percentage of light goods vehicles speeding on different types of roads in Great Britain between 2002 and 2014. All roads have seen a decrease in the percentage of LGV's that exceeded the speed limit. In 2002, the highest percentage of speeding vehicles was on 30 mph roads, however, by 2014 this had dropped to 47 percent.
This statistic shows the contents usually packed into children's lunch boxes in Great Britain in 2017. Of survey respondents, 94 percent usually pack a sandwich in their children's lunch box.

This statistic shows the percentage of U.S. women using prescribed drugs containing sex hormones between 1988 and 2014. According to the data, in 1999-2002 almost 15 percent of U.S. women used such drugs.

This statistic shows the airport market share of major car rental companies in the United States in 2013. Hertz Global Holdings had the largest share of the airport car rental market in 2013 at 36.1 percent.

This statistic shows the favourite aspects of flying in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2013. According to the survey, 31 percent of respondents said they liked free drinks on flights, while 25 percent stated they liked the convenience of being served quickly.

This statistic shows the responses that people from the United Kingdom ( UK ) gave when asked which features of flying in the future are most appealing to them. The most popular answer was that flying will be faster and more direct with 59 percent of respondents choosing this option.

In February 2020, the international air cargo traffic from and to Peru amounted to approximately 18.5 thousand metric tons. This represents a decrease of around 23.6 percent in comparison with the air cargo traffic reported during the same month a year earlier.
This statistic shows the per capita real Gross Domestic Product of California from 2000 to 2019. In 2019, the per capita real GDP of California stood at 70,826 chained 2012 U.S. dollars.

This statistic shows the total amount of pre-tax profits or losses claimed by the major United Kingdom ( UK ) airline companies in 2013/2014, in thousand British pounds. British Airways had the highest pre-tax loss at over 350 million British pounds. Second and third were EasyJet and Thomson Airways.

This statistic shows passenger satisfaction with security screening at Stansted Airport in the United Kingdom ( UK ) frim 2016 to 2019. During the 2019 survey, 81 percent of passengers reported being very or fairly satisfied, while five percent were very or fairly dissatisfied.
This statistic shows the per capita real Gross Domestic Product of Pennsylvania from 2000 to 2019. In 2019, the per capita real GDP of Pennsylvania stood at 57,067 chained 2012 U.S. dollars.

This statistic shows the price of tickets for a single journey on the London Underground in zones 1-4 paying by cash between 2004 and 2016. The price for a single ticket remained at four British pounds between 2009 and 2012 before increasing to 5.60 British pounds in 2013. In 2016, the price was 5.90 British pounds.

In 2020, the average annual expenditure on hair care products per consumer unit in the United States amounted to 65 U.S. dollars. This figure represents a decrease from the previous year, when the country's average expenditure on hair care products amounted to 78 U.S. dollars per consumer unit.

This statistic displays the leading cheese brands in the United Kingdom ( UK ), according to a survey conducted November 2013. Cheddar cheese was most popular cheese brand in the United Kingdom, with 51 percent of respondents purchasing this brand.

This statistic illustrates the leading five exporting countries of spirits into the United Kingdom in 2020, ranked by total export value. The United States ranked highest, with spirits exports valuing over 260 million British pounds, followed by Germany accounting for approximately 74 million British pounds worth of exports.

In 2021, the United States was the leading destination country for the export of tobacco from the United Kingdom. With an export value of approximately 1.6 billion British pounds, the U.S. was almost twice as big of a market for UK tobacco as the next biggest country, Switzerland.
This statistic shows the influence of product quality on sports footwear purchase decisions. 6 % of respondents rated product quality as very important.

As of March 2020, a significant share of consumers worldwide reduced their spending on day-to-day in-store purchases because of the coronavirus pandemic. According to a survey in Italy, 79 percent of respondents stated that they had reduced their spending on day-to-day in-store purchases. This figure was slightly lower for respondents in the United States, with 47 percent of consumers in the U.S. reporting that they had reduced their spending in this category.

This statistic shows the sales of the Richemont Group worldwide in FY2020/21, by distribution channel. In that year, the sales generated by the Richemont Group's retail channel was about 7.2 billion euros.

This statistic depicts the research and development expenses of Church & Dwight worldwide from 2009 to 2020. In 2020, Church & Dwight's global R & D expenditure amounted to approximately 103.1 million U.S. dollars.

This statistic shows the sales volume index of flowers, plants, seeds, fertilizers and pet foods sold in predominantly non-food stores in Great Britain from 2011 to 2020. The index was set at 100 in 2015. In 2020, the index value was measured at 103.1.

This statistic shows the most popular United States city destinations as of June 2014, by average guest hotel rating. New York City was the most popular city destination in the United States with an average guest hotel rating of 4.1.

This statistic depicts the countries with the highest share of the population that is overweight or obese worldwide as of 2016. In that year, the United States had one of the highest rates of overweight and obesity with almost 89 percent of the U.S. population being overweight or obese.

This statistic depicts the percentage of U.S. adults that take select dietary supplements, distributed by gender. The statistic is based on a survey conducted in August 2018. Among U.S. adult males, some 24 percent reported taking vitamin B-complex. Almost two-thirds of the adult population in the United States takes dietary supplements. The nutritional supplement industry has seen a large growth in the market, especially in protein supplements and vitamins.

This statistic shows the percentage of shoppers who plan to buy a brand before shopping in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2012, by category. Of respondents, 67 percent of shoppers in the clothes and bag category plan to buy a brand before shopping, while 41 percent of shoppers in the food category plan to do the same.

This statistic shows the taste rating of selected burger restaurant chains in the United States as of July 2014. During the survey, consumers gave burger restaurant chain Five Guys Burger and Steakhouse a taste rating of 8.1 out of 10.
The statistic shows the number of health and fitness clubs in European countries from 2013 to 2020. In Germany, the number of health & fitness clubs decreased from 8,834 in 2019 to 8,017 in 2020.

This statistic shows the nationalities who were the most frequent tippers while on vacation as of June 2014. During the survey, 31 percent of respondents from Spain said they left a tip when on vacation.

As of February 2022, the annual online marketplace transaction value in Chile amounted to approximately 7.7 million U.S. dollars. According to a recent study, the South American country was one of the Latin American countries with the lowest online marketplaces maturity.

From March 16 to 22, 2020, amidst the COVID-19 outbreak, sales of health items on online marketplace Mercado Brasileiro increased by nearly 124 percent comapred to the week from February 24 to March 1, 2020. Meanwhile, e-commerce overall sales increased by 40 percent.

This statistic gives information on the mobile internet penetration in Australia from 2015 to 2021. In 2016, 68.5 percent of the population accessed the internet from their mobile device. This figure is expected to grow to 74.3 percent in 2021.

This statistic presents the total annual turnover of the retail sales of bakery products and cereals ( including rice and pasta ) in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2008 to 2019. In 2019, turnover from the retail sales of bakery products and cereals amounted to approximately 23 billion British pounds.

This statistic shows the total annual revenue of the retail sale of tools and equipment for house and garden in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2008 to 2019. Over this period, tools and equipment retail sales increased from 3.1 billion British pounds in 2008 to approximately 5.1 billion in 2019.

This statistic shows the willingness of people in England to reduce travel by car in order to protect the environment from 2011 to 2020. The share of respondents who strongly agreed with this idea increased from 7 percent in 2011 to 17 percent in 2020.

This statistic displays the share of individuals who agree or disagree with the statement that 'drinking alcohol is harmful to your health'in Great Britain from 2006 to 2017. In 2017, approximately 38 percent of respondents reported they strongly disagreed with the statement that 'drinking alcohol is harmful to your health '.

This statistic shows international visitor spending in Paris from 2010 to 2018. In 2018, international visitor spending in Paris amounted to 14 billion U.S. dollars, up from 12.7 billion the previous year.

This statistic displays the 10 U.S. states with the highest annual cost for a private room in a community and assisted living facility as of 2020. Annual costs for a private room in a community and assisted living facility in Massachusetts amounted to 73,923 U.S. dollars as of 2020.

The number of licensed plug-in government grant eligible cars in the United Kingdom ( UK ) increased considerably between the first quarter of 2010 and the fourth quarter of 2020. In the first quarter of 2010, there were only 1,500 plug-in cars and by the fourth quarter of 2020, this figure had increased to 267,000 plug-in cars.

This statistic displays the distribution of insurers'medical care spending under Obamacare as of 2014, by segment. During this year, 30 percent of the insurers'medical care spending was dedicated to inpatient care.

This statistic shows the change in the number of ultra-low emission, non-plug-in government grant eligible vans licensed in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between the first quarter of 2010 and the third quarter of 2017. The number of vans fell from 237 to 175 over this period.

As of March 2020, almost a quarter of respondents in the United States expected to spend either somewhat or a lot more on groceries as a result of the coronavirus pandemic. Respondents expected to either spend about the same or a lot less on a number of other consumer goods as well.

This statistic shows the number of international overnight visitors in the most popular city destinations in the Middle East and Africa in 2016. Dubai had the largest number of international overnight visitors in 2016 with 14.93 million.

There were over 18.5 thousand seizures of cocaine by the police forces of England and Wales in 2019/20, compared with just over 500 in the previous reporting year, when there were almost 17.5 thousand seizures.

This statistic shows the number of people employed in the restaurant and mobile food service activities industry in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2008 to 2019. In 2019, the number of employees in the restaurant and mobile food service activities industry was approximately 1.07 million.

This bar chart shows the carbon dioxide emissions of vehicles according to their fuel type in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in selected years from 2000 to 2016. CO2 emissions have been falling for all the fuel types aside from a slight increase in petrol emissions in 2007. In 2013 diesel vehicles emitted 0.4 g/km more than petrol vehicles and 33.7 g/km more than alternative fuel vehicles.

This statistic presents the most popular online shopping categories in the United States as of September 2017, sorted by gender. According to the findings, the most popular online shopping category among female respondents were fashion and apparel products, with a 71 percent respondent share.

This statistic presents consumer opinions on mobile-optimized websites in the United States as of January 2014. During a survey, it was found that 66 percent of respondents stated they thought mobile-optimized websites were more secure than non-optimized websites.

The number of tourist arrivals from China to Europe decreased in 2020 over the previous year due to the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic. In 2019, there were approximately 5.9 million arrivals in Western Europe, while in 2020, this figure dropped to 1.5 million. Arrivals in Central and Northern Europe also decreased by roughly 70 percent in 2020 over 2019.

This statistic shows the percentage of British respondents that felt that having British citizenship is important for being  truly British  when asked in 1995, 2003 and 2013. The perceived importance of British citizenship has not changed over this period. In 2013, 85 percent of those surveyed felt that having British citizenship is important for being  truly British

This statistic shows the size of herbal cannabis seizures by Border Force in England and Wales in 2017/18. Most of such seizures were of amounts between 1 and 500 grams. There were, however, five seizures of between 10 and 100 kilograms. There were a total of 3,823 herbal cannabis seizures over this twelve month period.

This statistic shows the size of amphetamine seizures by Border Force in England and Wales in 2017/18. Most of such seizures were of amounts between 1 and 500 grams. There were a total of 45 amphetamine seizures over this twelve month period.

The chart presents two forecasts - a baseline forecast and a scenario forecast - for the global smartphone shipments in 2020 and 2021, respectively, as impacted by the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic. The baseline forecast predicts a decline in global smartphone shipments from 1,390 million in 2019 to 1,300 million in 2020, with a recovery in 2021 to 1,410 million. The scenario forecast, on the other hand, predicts a more significant drop in shipments from 1,440 million in 2019 to 1,200 million in 2020, with a further decline to 1,400 million in 2021.

This statistic shows the size of ketamine seizures by Border Force in England and Wales in 2017/18. The majority of such seizures were of amounts between 1 and 500 grams. There were a total of 53 ketamine seizures over this twelve month period.

This statistic shows the percentage of British respondents that felt that immigrants take jobs away from people who were born in Britain, when asked in 2003 and 2013. The perceived threat of immigrants taking British jobs increased by seven percentage points over this ten year period.

In 2020, Mexico's tequila exports amounted to approximately 287 million liters, up from around 234 million liters the previous year. In the past two decades, the volume of tequila exported from the country increased by more than 150 million liters.

As of July 2021, the highest grossing Bollywood movie produced in India was Street Dancer 3K, earning over 320 million Indian rupees and over 340 million U.S. dollars in the global box office. The second highest grossing film was Bahubali 2.0, followed by Street Dancer 2, all of which were produced in 2019.

In 2020, 82 percent of tourism expenditures in Latin America were made for leisure purposes, while 18 percent were business-oriented. That year, the region's travel and tourism sector contributed to 9.5 percent of its GDP.

The leading causes of death in lower-middle income countries worldwide in 2016 were heart disease, stroke, lower respiratory infections, and diarrheal diseases. The death rate from heart disease was around 119 deaths per 100,000 people. This statistic shows the leading causes of death in lower-middle income countries worldwide in 2016, by death rate.

This statistic shows different dealership franchises'ratings of their manufacturers'sales incentive programmes in the United Kingdom ( UK ) according to a car dealership survey carried out in January 2016. The respondents gave a score out of ten. Jaguar and Volvo dealers gave their manufacturer's sales incentive programme the lowest rating while the highest score of 9.2 out of 10 was given by Lexus dealers.

This statistic displays the average price of EpiBex in selected countries in 2017. In that year, the price of EpiBex averaged 4,643 U.S. dollars in the United States. EpiBex is a drug used, for example, to treat allergic reactions in emergency situations.

This statistic displays the hospital admission prices for a normal delivery in selected countries in 2017. In that year, the cost of a normal delivery in a hospital stood at some 6,200 U.S. dollars in Australia, while costs in the U.S. stood at some 11,400 U.S. dollars. Medical costs in the United States are among the highest in the world.

This statistic shows the sales value of windscreen wipers, defrosters and demisters for cycles or motor vehicles based on PRODCOM estimates * * in the United Kingdom between 2010 and 2018. The UK experienced a decrease in sales value over this period. The sales value reached a low point of 4.3 million British pounds in 2018.

In Brazil, Google searches for `` sanitize '' increased 368 percent on March 15, 2020, compared to the average registered on Sundays from January 19 and March 8 in the same year. The search for `` coffee filters '' increased by 142 percent, while `` masks '' ranked third, with a growth of 99 percent. The changes were accredited to the outbreak of the novel coronavirus ( SARS-CoV-2 ), which causes the COVID-19. It has been estimated that Brazil would need more than 150 million masks per month to protect the population.

This statistic shows TV shows which most representative family reunion vacations in the United States as of June 2014. During the survey, 28 percent of respondents stated that Modern Family depicted in the TV show The Modern Family Show represented their most representative family reunion vacations.

This statistic shows the songs which most representative family reunion vacations in the United States as of June 2014. During the survey, 40 percent of respondents stated that the song `` I 'll Fight '' by K-Ci and The Gangs represented their most representative family reunion vacations.

This statistic shows the results of a survey on the subjects that females aged 15 to 21 years old are most passionate about in Great Britain in 2014. The most popular answer was music with 47 percent of female respondents agreeing so.

This statistic shows the results of a survey question asking the British public's opinion on how ethical retail companies are nowadays. Of respondents, the majority felt that retail companies were not very ethical, with a total of 79 percent believing that companies were not very ethical.

This statistic shows the results of a survey on self-identification as a feminist in Germany in 2017. During the survey period it was found that, out of all responding women, 7 percent defined themselves as feminists - someone who advocates and supports equal opportunities for women.

Scooters and mopeds are two types of electric mobility vehicles. As with other vehicles, sales tend to spike in March and September due to the release of new registrations. This also explains the lower sales in February. In August 2021, there were 442 thousand mopeds and 400 thousand scooters sold in the United Kingdom.

This statistic displays the global inflammation and autoimmunity therapy market by condition based on the MAT ( moving annual total ) until the third quarter of 2015 ( October 2014 to September 2015 ). In that year, the global gout therapy market was worth 1.1 billion U.S. dollars. Autoimmune diseases are defined as the body's own immune system attacks its own tissues which can cause inflammation

This statistic shows the percentage of British respondents that felt that Britain should take stronger measures to exclude illegal immigrants from 2003 to 2013. There was a net increase of 10 percent over this ten year period.

This statistic shows the revenue of GSK from 2012 to 2020, by region. In 2020, the revenue generated in the United States was some 4.3 billion U.S. dollars. The global revenue of GSK was some 14.3 billion U.S. dollars.

This statistic shows the most popular subjects among 15 to 21 year olds in Great Britain in 2014, according to a survey conducted by UM London and the Student Room. The most popular subject among this age group was music with 41 percent of respondents stating it as one of their favorite subjects.

Since the novel coronavirus outbreak ( COVID-19 ) in March 2020, traffic reduction in major cities across the world has led to a significant reduction in the volume of online traffic. Between February and March 2020, online traffic in Australia dropped by 21 percent, and in the United States it fell by 17 percent. In April 2020, online traffic in Italy dropped by 78 percent compared to the same month in 2019.

This statistic shows the percentage of British respondents that felt that international organisations are taking away power from the British government, when asked in 2003 and 2013. The perceived threat of international organisations increasing their power has risen by 11 percentage points over this ten year period.

In December 2020, some 77 new sportbikes were sold in the United Kingdom. This was a significant decrease compared to the 261 sales made in the same month the previous year. Overall, 2017 was a successful year for sales with a total of 1,849 units sold. The most popular type of bike sold in 2017 were standard bikes, accounting for 1,296 sales.

Based on PRODCOM * estimates, the sales value of steering wheels, steering columns, steering boxes and their parts for tractors, motor cars and other motor vehicles was decreasing between 2010 and 2013, peaking at 233.6 million British pounds in 2016. In 2020, the sales value reached 141.5 million British pounds.

This statistic shows the total number of non-moped and moped motorcycles sold in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between January 2017 and December 2020. As with other vehicles, sales tend to spike in March and September due to the release of new registrations. This also explains the lower sales in February.

In June 2021, Yamaha sold approximately 1,900 motorcycles in the United Kingdom market. This was a year-on-year increase of around 21 percent compared to the sales volume of the same month in 2020. Overall, 2019 was a good year for Yamaha in terms of sales. The company managed to increase its sales volume in all months, except April and May 2020, when the UK lockdown was in place.

This statistic shows the number of auctioned cars of all age groups in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between September 2014 and January 2016. The number of cars fluctuated seasonally but reached a low point of approximately 57 thousand cars in December 2014.

The chart displays the distribution of the health care and immunization budget across India for the years 2008, 2009, 2010, 2011, and 2012. In 2008, the budget for health care was higher at 15 compared to immunization which was at 1. The following year, 2009, saw a slight increase in both categories with health care budget at 17 and immunization at 1.1. The trend continued with a further increase in the health care budget to 20 in 2010, and a decrease in immunization to 1.2. In 2011, the health care budget reached its peak at 23, while immunization stood at 1. The year 2012 saw a significant increase in the health care budget to 25, with immunization also increasing to 1.5.

This statistic shows the rate of registrations of newly diagnosed cases of cancer per 100,000 population in England from 1995 to 2019, by gender. Cancer is an aggregation of diseases in which cells within a part of the body begin to grow abnormally, often spreading to other parts of the body. In 2019, 689.1 males and 548.1 females per 100,000 population were registered as newly diagnosed with cancer. The rate of males and females registered as newly diagnosed with cancer increased from compared to the previous year.
The statistic shows the number of suicide bombings in 2013 compared to 2011. In 2011, 200 suicide attacks were counted, whereas in 2013 the number of attacks had increased to 274.

This statistic shows the rate of registrations of newly diagnosed cases of stomach cancer per 100,000 population in England from 1995 to 2019, by gender. Stomach cancer, which is also known as gastric cancer, is cancer which begins in the stomach, particularly the lining of the stomach. In 2019, 14.5 males and 6.7 females per 100,000 population were registered as newly diagnosed with stomach cancer. The rate of newly diagnosed cases of stomach cancer has decreased for females since 1995, but the rate of males registered as newly diagnosed has increased.
In 2020, the vast majority of children in Poland watched TV three to six times a week. Twenty-nine percent of the respondents watched TV less often than that, while eight percent never watched TV.

This statistic shows the rate of registrations of newly diagnosed cases of colon cancer per 100,000 population in England from 1995 to 2019, by gender. Colon cancer, also known as colorectal cancer, occurs in the colon or rectum more specifically it occurs when cells in the colon or rectum begin to grown abnormally. In 2019, 53.5 males and 41.7 females per 100,000 population were registered as newly diagnosed with colon cancer. This was a decrease on the previous year's rate of registration among males and females.

This statistic shows the rate of registrations of newly diagnosed cases of testicular cancer per 100,000 population in England from 1995 to 2019. Testicular cancer occurs when cells within the testis begin to grow abnormally, these cells often form a tumor. In 2019, 7.2 males per 100,000 population were registered as newly diagnosed with testicular cancer. This was a decrease on the previous year's rate of registration.

This statistic shows the value from EU and non-EU exports of generators for combustion engines in the United Kingdom between 2010 and January 2018. The EU was clearly an important trade partner for the United Kingdom over this period. EU exports of combustion engine generators reached a value of 19.6 million British pounds in 2017.

This statistic shows the value from EU and non-EU exports of electrical ignition or starting equipment and cut-outs of a kind used for internal combustion engines in the United Kingdom between 2010 and 2013. The EU was clearly an important trade partner for the United Kingdom over this period. EU exports of electrical ignition equipment for engines reached a value of 2.9 million British pounds in 2013.

This statistic shows the value from EU and non-EU exports of airbags with inflator system in the United Kingdom between 2010 and 2017. The EU was clearly an important trade partner for the United Kingdom over this period. EU exports of airbags with inflator systems reached a value of 57.2 million British pounds in 2013.

This statistic shows the value from EU and non-EU exports of suspension systems and parts thereof for motor vehicles in the United Kingdom between 2010 and 2017. The EU was clearly an important trade partner for the United Kingdom over this period. EU exports of vehicle suspension systems reached a value of 181.2 million British pounds in 2013.

This statistic shows the value from EU and non-EU exports of silencers and their parts for tractors, motor cars and other motor vehicles in the United Kingdom between 2010 and 2017. The EU was clearly an important trade partner for the United Kingdom over this period. EU exports of motor vehicle silencers reached a value of 68.1 million British pounds in 2013.

This statistic shows the number of Peugeot 307 cars registered in Great Britain between 2001 and the final quarter of 2018. The figures represent a running cumulative total. The number of registered cars grew from around 24.7 thousand in 2001 to over 300 thousand by the end of 2010, before declining again.

This statistic shows the number of Citroen C3 cars registered in Great Britain between 2002 and the final quarter of 2018. The figures represent a running cumulative total. The number of registered cars grew from around 17,600 in 2002 to some 241,000 in 2018.

This statistic shows the number of Toyota Avensis cars registered in Great Britain between 2000 and the final quarter of 2018. The figures represent a running cumulative total. The Toyota Avensis was one of the most popular car models in Britain by 2018. The number of registered cars grew from around 64,000 in 2000 to 207,000 by 2010. As of 2018, figures had decreased to roughly 123,000 vehicles.

On May 31, some 4.6 percent of respondents in the United States stated that the pandemic has a most severe impact on their personal finances. This number represents the share of top 3 mentions on a scale of 1 ( no impact at all ) to 10 ( severely impacted ).

This statistic shows the number of Nissan Almera cars registered in Great Britain between 2000 and the final quarter of 2018. The figures represent a running cumulative total. The Nissan Almera was one of the most popular car models in Britain by 2018. The number of registered cars fell from 90.2 thousand in 2000 to 50.9 thousand by 2018.

This statistic shows the volume of EU and non-EU exports of silencers and parts thereof for tractors, motor cars and other motor vehicles in the United Kingdom between 2010 and 2013. The EU was clearly an important trade partner for the United Kingdom over this period. EU exports of motor vehicle silencers reached a volume of 5.9 million kilograms in 2013.

This statistic shows the percentage of U.S. population who knows a victim of workplace sexual harassment, assault, or rape. The survey was conducted in January 2014. 78 percent of respondents stated they do not know a victim of sexual harassment, sexual assault, or rape who worked for their company.

This statistic shows the total number of registered Triumph Street Triple model motorcycles in Great Britain between 2007 and 2018. The number of Triumph Street Triples in Great Britain increased from 48 in 2007 to 8.6 thousand in 2018, although figures had declined slightly in the previous two years.

This statistic shows the number of Mercedes Sprinter light goods vehicles registered in Great Britain between 2000 and 2019. The figures represent a running cumulative total. The Mercedes Sprinter was one of the most popular LGV models in Britain by 2019. The number of registered vehicles grew from around 26,600 in 2000 to some 208,300 registered vehicles by 2019.

This statistic shows the number of Mercedes Vito light goods vehicles registered in Great Britain between 2000 and 2018. The figures represent a running cumulative total. The number of registered vehicles grew from 17.3 thousand in 2000 to 77.7 thousand by the end of 2018.

This statistic shows the number of Fiat Doblo light goods vehicles registered in Great Britain between 2001 and 2018. The figures represent a running cumulative total. The number of registered vehicles grew from 2.7 thousand in 2001 to 41.2 thousand by the end of 2018.

This statistic shows the number of Toyota Hiace light goods vehicles registered in Great Britain between 2000 and 2018. The figures represent a running cumulative total. The number of registered vehicles grew from 35.7 thousand in 2000 to a peak of 39 thousand by 2007. It has, however, been decreasing since then, reaching 20.1 thousand registered vehicles by 2018.
This statistic shows the research and development expenditure of the tesa Group worldwide in 2012 and 2013. In 2013, tesa's global R & D expenditure amounted to approximately 41 million euros.

The coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic had a major impact on travel throughout Europe in 2020, with many countries seeing a drop in tourism revenue due to travel restrictions and public health concerns. In April 2020, bed night revenue in Barcelona dropped by 78 percent when compared to the same period in 2019.

This statistic shows the impacts of poor quality sleep on select performance measures in the U.S. in 2019. In the survey, it was found that poor quality sleep impacted job performance and relations with others, to a similar extent as getting enough sleep.

This statistic shows the revenue of the Universal Music Group from music publishing from 2007 to 2020. In 2020, UMG generated a total revenue of over 1.37 billion euros from music publishing, up from 1.03 billion a year earlier.

This statistic shows the number of registered Leyland DAF 45 FA 45 model heavy goods vehicles in Great Britain between 2000 and 2018. The number of Leyland DAF 45 FA 45 in Great Britain decreased from 26.9 thousand in 2000 to 3.7 thousand in 2018, following a period of decline.

This statistic shows the number of Mercedes Sprinter heavy goods vehicles registered in Great Britain between 2000 and 2018. The figures represent a running cumulative total. The Mercedes Sprinter was one of the most popular LGV models in Britain by 2018. The number of registered vehicles grew from 994 in 2000 to 5.2 thousand by 2018.

This statistic shows the number of Isuzu Trucks NGR vehicles registered in Great Britain between 2000 and 2018. The figures represent a running cumulative total. The number of registered vehicles grew from 689 in 2000 to 5,049 in 2010, before declining in the following years.

This statistic shows the total income from the output of forage plants in the United Kingdom from 2000 to 2020. Despite some fluctuation over the period, income generally rose between 2000 and 2020. In 2020, income peaked at 215 million British pounds.

This statistic shows the average output price of all agricultural products in the United Kingdom from 1994 to 2019. Despite some fluctuation over the period, output prices generally rose between 1994 and 2019. In 2019, the average output price amounted to 113.33 index points.

This statistic shows the average summer travel spend per person in the United States from 2011 to 2016. In 2015, the average summer travel spend per person was 1,036 U.S. dollars, down from 1,192 in 2014.
This statistic shows the retail sales of chewing gum in Canada from 2010 to 2018. Retail sales of chewing gum amounted to approximately 0.4 billion U.S. dollars in 2018.

This statistic shows the annual mileage for diesel and petrol cars in England in 2014 comparing both types of vehicles for the purposes of carbon dioxide and fuel consumption taxation. Business trips covered the least amount of miles out of the various trip types with other private reasons had the highest share. Cars with a diesel engine covered the furthest distances annually with the only type of vehicle which travelled more than petrol cars was the all car category.

The statistic depicts the sales growth of the leading 20 ethnic hair care brands in the United States in 2014. Less than half of the leading brands saw an increase in sales. The Organix regular shampoo brand had the highest increase in sales with a 31.4 percent increase over the last year. Most brands experienced a decrease in sales figures. Sales of the L'Oral Feria women's hair coloring brand, for example, dropped 4.2 percent from the previous year.

In March 2020, nearly 40 percent of bookings related to travel and tourism made through the website TravelgateX in Brazil were cancelled. The website registered a total of 1.2 million bookings in the South American country in March 2020. The high cancellation rate during the first months of the year are linked to the COVID-19 outbreak, caused by the novel coronavirus ( SARS-CoV-2 ). In Brazil, the first cases of the disease were reported on February 26, 2020.

This statistic shows the number of international roll-on/roll-off short sea journey passenger movements occurring at the port of London, United Kingdom, between 2003 and 2017. Despite a dip in 2008, the number of passenger movements at the port of London generally increased. In 2017, the port of London witnessed approximately 11 million passenger movements.

This statistic shows the number of international roll-on/roll-off short sea journey passenger movements occurring at the port of Plymouth in the United Kingdom between 2003 and 2017. Despite being a major city in the United Kingdom, Plymouth has seen a decline in passenger movements at its port.

The graph shows the job satisfaction rates of journalists from 1971 to 2013. In 1971, the rate was at 48 percent, which decreased to 40 percent in 1980. The lowest job satisfaction was recorded in 2013 with a rate of 22 percent.

This statistic shows the number of international roll-on/roll-off short sea journey passenger movements occurring at the port of Hull in the United Kingdom between 2003 and 2020. Despite being a major city in the United Kingdom, Hull has seen a decline in passenger movements at its port. This decline could be attributable to the fact that the city is located further from the coast than other major UK cities, meaning that travel by sea is the only option for passengers to get there. In 2020, the number of passenger movements at the port of Hull dropped to 222,000.
This statistic shows the price per route of low cost airlines in Europe in 2013 and 2014. The average price of a flight with easyJet was 86.97 euros in 2014.

This statistic shows the attitudes of United Kingdom ( UK ) adults towards career progression in 2014. Among respondents, 63 percent agree that having more experience in the job or industry is important for career progression, while 40 percent believe networking and building relationships is important.

This statistic presents the mobile payment methods used for mobile purchases according to adult U.S. mobile buyers. During the December 2015 survey period, it was found that 49 percent of U.S. buyers had used a mobile payment method such as Apple Pay or Android Pay to pay for a mobile purchase.

This statistic displays the number of people employed in the pharmaceutical industry in Europe from 1990 to 2020. In 1990, the number of employees in the pharmaceutical industry in Europe stood at approximately 505 thousand. By 2020, the number of employees had increased to some 828 thousand.

This statistic shows the share of citizens in the United States who normally take a summer vacation as of August 2014, by gender. During the survey, 58 percent of the female respondents said they usually take a summer vacation compared to 54 percent of the male respondents.

This statistic shows the average travel spend per night in the United States from 2012 to 2016, by type of travel agency used. In the 12 months leading to May 2014, U.S. travelers spent an average of 495 U.S. dollars per night when staying with a travel agent who had booked the trip for them.

This statistic shows the opinion of the French on the way the containment rules were set up by the country's authorities in light of the novel coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) in March 2020. According to Ipsos, 46 percent of the respondents stated that the French authorities acted badly in setting up containment rules in light of COVID-19.

This statistic shows the most annoying factors for air travelers in the United States as of July 2014. During the survey, 68 percent of respondents said that uncomfortable seats annoyed them when flying.
This statistic shows the most important import partners for Denmark in 2019. In 2019, the most important import partner for Denmark was Germany with a share of 21 percent in all imports.

This statistic shows the travel planning methods of Generation X in the United States as of July 2016. During the survey, 31 percent of Generation X respondents said they used a DMO website for travel planning.

This statistic shows the results of a survey asking UK consumers when they intend to purchase a 4k Ultra-High definition television. Of respondents, 50 percent said they do not know, while 26 percent said they will purchase a 4k UHD TV within the next five years.

The statistic presents the impact of the creation of new bank products, delivery channels and expansion on the existing banking market in the United States in 2013. In that time, 27 percent of the banks stated that the introduction of new products had a negative impact on their business, while 41 percent of the banks claimed that it had no effect on their bank's business.

This statistic shows the number of new small rigid heavy goods vehicles registered in the United Kingdom between January 2014 and July 2016 on a monthly basis. High sales in March and September were due to the issuance of new vehicle registration numbers. Registrations in July and August were generally lower.

This statistic shows the share of employees who were satisfied with their allotted paid vacation time worldwide as of August 2014, by country. In France, 80 percent of respondents reported being satisfied with their allotted paid vacation time.

This statistic shows the number of new large rigid heavy goods vehicles registered in the United Kingdom between January 2013 and October 2015 on a monthly basis. Registrations in 2014 were almost consistently lower than in 2013.

This statistic shows the number of new monthly art auction registrations in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from January 2013 to October 2015. The number of art auction registrations fluctuated during the period, reaching a total of 583 in October 2015.
This statistic depicts the number of customer transactions at Home Depot and Lowe's worldwide from 2011 to 2020. In 2020, the Home Depot carried out 1.76 billion customer transactions worldwide.

The 400 meter hurdles has been included in all Olympic Games for men since 1900, while the women's event was first introduced in 1928. The men's Olympic record was set by the US'Kenny Harrison in 1996, with a time of 46.78 seconds, and the women's Olympic record was set by Jamaica's Melanie Walker in 2008, with a time of 52.64 seconds. The most successful athletes in the 400m hurdles are the US'Kenny Harrison, who won two golds and one bronze medal between 1996 and 2004, and the US'Dalilah Muhammad, who won two golds and one bronze medal between 2008 and 2016.

As of November 2019, around half of all Americans surveyed believed that climate change was a result of human activity. In comparison, only about one-fifth of surveyed Republicans felt the same. These findings are in line with previous surveys that show a general consensus among the public that global warming is caused by human activity.

This statistic presents the back-to-college shopping payment methods in the United States in 2017. The survey revealed that 45 percent of the respondents will most likely use a debit or credit card when shopping for back-to-college items.

This statistic shows the percentage of Americans who were married between the age of 18 and 32, as of 2014, by generation. In 2014, only 14.9 percent of Millennials were married between the age of 18 and 32.

In 2020/21 there were 5,631 people arrested in England and Wales for fraud offences, compared with 7,371 in the previous reporting year. During the provided time period, the number of people arrested for fraud offences peaked in 2015/16, when 14,542 people were arrested.

Data on the number of persons arrested for criminal damage and arson offences in England and Wales from 2015/16 to 2020/21 shows that the number of persons arrested for these offences fluctuated during the period, reaching a peak of over 61.5 thousand persons arrested in 2015/16. In 2020/21, the number of persons arrested amounted to 47,098.

This statistic presents the results of a survey on the frequency of use of various banking channels in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2011 to 2015. In 2011, internet was the most frequently used channel for banking, according to 80 percent of the respondents, whereas in 2015, it was still the most popular channel, used by 75 percent of the respondents.

This statistic displays the opinion of survey respondents, by generation, if the government should be responsible for providing health insurance to citizens in the United States. During the survey conducted in July 2014, 50 percent of Millennials stated that the government should be responsible for providing health insurance to citizens.

This statistic shows the results of a survey fielded in the United Kingdom in 2012 concerning internet users and non-users, broken down by socio-economic group. In 2012, 38 percent of internet users reported having a degree or higher, while only 5 percent of non-internet users reported having a degree or higher.

This statistic presents the back-to-school electronics purchases expected by U.S. parents in 2015 and 2016. The survey revealed that 28 percent of parents expected to purchase a laptop for back-to-school in 2016.

This statistic provides information on the distribution of Twitter users in Argentina as of January 2021, broken down by gender. During the survey period, 38.6 percent of Twitter audiences in the South American country were women and 61.4 percent were men.

This statistic shows the level of trust that adults from the United Kingdom ( UK ) were willing to place in small businesses in June 2014. When respondents were asked to give a value on a scale from 1 to 5, where 1 is  very poor level of trust  and 5 is  very strong level of trust , the mean response on this scale was 3.05, indicating a medium to strong level of trust from the UK public.

In 2020, 35 percent of companies in Poland forced employees to take a break from work due to the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic. Every fifth company decided to dismiss its employees after one month of work.

This statistic shows the level of trust that adults from the United Kingdom ( UK ) were willing to place in multilateral firms in June 2014. When respondents were asked to give a value on a scale from 1 to 5, where 1 is  very poor level of trust  and 5 is  very strong level of trust , the mean response on this scale was 2.25, indicating a poor to medium level of trust from the UK public.

This statistic shows the level of trust that adults from the United Kingdom ( UK ) were willing to place in creative companies in June 2014. When respondents were asked to give a value on a scale from 1 to 5, where 1 is  very poor level of trust  and 5 is  very strong level of trust , the mean response on this scale was 3.27, indicating a medium to strong level of trust from the UK public.

This statistic shows the level of trust that adults from the United Kingdom ( UK ) were willing to place in construction companies in June 2014. When respondents were asked to give a value on a scale from 1 to 5, where 1 is  very poor level of trust  and 5 is  very strong level of trust , the mean response on this scale was 2.7, indicating a poor to medium level of trust from the UK public.

This statistic displays the results of a survey of individuals in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2012, regarding their agreement with the statement, `` I like technology that improves human contact ''. Five percent of male respondents reported they strongly disagreed with the statement. Individuals aged 16 to 24 were most likely to report disagreement with the statement.

This statistic shows the level of trust that adults from the United Kingdom ( UK ) were willing to place in law firms in June 2014. When respondents were asked to give a value on a scale from 1 to 5, where 1 is  very poor level of trust  and 5 is  very strong level of trust , the mean response on this scale was 2.6, indicating a poor to medium level of trust from the UK public.

This statistic displays the results of a survey of individuals in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2012, regarding media consumption on weekends. During the survey, 29 percent of respondents reported watching live TV from a TV channel on a weekend.

This statistic displays the results of a survey of individuals in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2012, regarding media consumption first thing in the morning. Twenty-six percent of respondents reported listening to the radio first thing in the morning.

This statistic shows the results of a survey among fathers in the United States in 1989 and 2012 on reasons for staying at home with their children. In 1989, 6 percent of stay-at-home fathers in the U.S. stated that they were at home with their children because they could not find a job. In 2012, 21 percent of stay-at-home fathers said the same.
This statistic shows the total population of Taiwan from 1990 to 2018, with forecasts up to 2030. In 2018, the total population of Taiwan amounted to approximately 23.53 million inhabitants.

This statistic provides information on the most popular social networks in selected Arab countries as of November 2014, based on reach. During that period of time, Facebook was the most popular social network in the region with a reach of 87 percent.

The hourly traffic on March 11, 2020 was analyzed on the Pornhub platform in Italy. The search of content on the website increased significantly from 9:00am to 2:00pm. This scenario improved the most the first day of the lockdown imposed by the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ). The highest increase in traffic was recorded between 2:00pm and 4:00pm. Pornhub registered a large increase in traffic since the beginning of March 2020. The platform registered over two million visits in the first 24 hours of the lockdown.

This statistic shows the responses that adults from the United Kingdom ( UK ) gave when asked `` To what extent do you agree or disagree with the following statement : 'Businesses do not take effective action to regain trust after a damaging event''' as of June 2014. The majority of respondents felt that businesses did not take effective action to regain trust after a damaging event, with 41 percent of respondents feeling this way strongly.
