This statistic shows the quarterly trend in the volume of all retail sales ( quantity bought ) including automotive fuel in Great Britain from 1st quarter 2015 to 3rd quarter 2021. The figures are seasonally adjusted estimates, measured using the Retail Sales Index ( RSI ) and published in index form with a reference year of 2018 equal to 100. Over the time period observed, retail sales increased significantly except for the second quarter of 2020 and the first quarter of 2021, where the volume of sales fell to an all-time low of 89.9 in the first quarter of 2020. Sales volume had a strong recovery in the second quarter of 2021 and peaked at an index value of 109.9 in the second quarter of 2021.

Due to the coronavirus ( i.e. covid-19 ) pandemic, some Premier League football clubs may struggle financially over the next few months, due to the cancellation and/or postponement of football fixtures. During a representative survey of the British adult population, undertaken on the 31st March 2020, respondents were asked their opinions on whether Premier League football players should be prepared to take a 'pay cut'during the COVID-19 pandemic. Responses have subsequently been categorized by the age of the panelist.

The unemployment rate in Finland increased from 5.7 percent in 2011 to 7.7 percent in 2021. The highest unemployment rate was measured among young people aged 15 to 24 years. In 2021, the unemployment rate among 25 to 34 year-olds stood at 7.6 percent, while the rate for 35 to 54 year-olds was 5.6 percent.

This statistic shows the number of asylum applications from unaccompanied foreign minors in Finland in 2015 and 2016, by country of origin. During the period under survey, the number of asylum applications from unaccompanied minors of Pakistani origin amounted to 1,895 in 2015 and 1,093 in 2016.

This statistic shows the median age of the population in Yemen from 1950 to 2050. The median age is the age that divides a population into two numerically equal groups ; that is, half the people are younger than this age and half are older. It is a single index that summarizes the age distribution of a population. In 2015, the median age of the population of Yemen was 19.1 years.

In 2021, 78 percent of Russian women between 18 and 45 years old had gynecologist's visits at least once a year. The second largest share of respondents was recorded at 13 percent, reporting less frequent visits to gynecologists.

This statistic shows the average inflation rate in Vanuatu from 1986 to 2020, with projections up until 2026. In 2020, the average inflation rate in Vanuatu amounted to about 5.44 percent compared to the previous year.

This statistic shows the total population of Vanuatu from 2016 to 2020, with projections up until 2026. In 2020, the total population of Vanuatu was estimated to amount to approximately 300,000 inhabitants.
This statistic shows the age structure in Vanuatu from 2010 to 2020. In 2020, about 38.63 percent of Vanuatu's total population were aged 0 to 14 years.

This statistic represents the percentage of persons in the U.S. aged 16-25 years who reported driving a vehicle under the influence of marijuana, as of 2014. Some 34 percent of persons in this age group reported that they have driven under the influence of marijuana within the past year.

This statistic shows the median age of the population in Vanuatu from 1950 to 2050 *.The median age is the age that divides a population into two numerically equal groups ; that is, half the people are younger than this age and half are older. It is a single index that summarizes the age distribution of a population. In 2015, the median age of the population of Vanuatu was 21.2 years.

This statistic shows the average inflation rate in Tunisia from 1986 to 2020, with projections up until 2026. In 2020, the average inflation rate in Tunisia amounted to about 5.81 percent compared to the previous year.

The employment rate in Finland fluctuated between roughly 68 and 72 percent from 2011 to 2021. After reaching a low of 68 percent in 2014, the employment rate started to increase, and it peaked at 72 percent in 2021.

In 2015, Amazon's share of the U.S. fashion retail market was 16 percent, and this is expected to increase significantly by 2020. The platform is one of the largest fashion retailers in the world, trailing only Zalando and H & M.

This statistic shows spending on visits from Hungary to the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2010 and 2016, by gender. Spending by female visitors increased from 2010 to 2013, but declined in the following year. In 2016, similar spending by male visitors amounted to 48 million pounds.

This statistic shows spending on visits from the Irish Republic to the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2010 and 2016, by gender. Spending by female visitors declined sharply in 2012, but recovered afterwards. In 2016, similar spending by male visitors amounted to 585 million British pounds.

In 2020, the most searched for TV series worldwide included `` Game of Thrones '', `` Stranger Things '', and `` The Crown ''. Other popular titles included `` Avatar '', `` X-Men : Days of Future Past '', and `` A Song of Ice and Fire ''. The most searched for TV series of all time was `` The Big Bang Theory '' with over 101 million monthly searches.

This statistic shows the worlds's top 50 health care equipment and services companies based on R & D spending growth through the year 2020. The statistic shows that Becton, Dickinson, and Company had a R & D spending growth of 191 percent through the year 2020.

This statistic shows the share of tech graduates employed six months after graduation in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2013 and 2014, by industry. The share of respondents who were employed in IT within six months of graduating was at 39 percent in 2013 and 2014.
The number of single-person households in Sweden increased slightly but constantly from 2011 to 2020. The number grew from 1.8 million in 2011, up to around 1.93 million in 2020.

This statistic shows the reported rate of thefts of goods or currency with a value of over five thousand Canadian dollars in Canada from 2000 to 2019. There were roughly 57.16 thefts of over five thousand dollars per 100,000 residents in Canada in 2019.

This statistic shows spending on visits from Australia to the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2010 and 2016, by gender. Spending by female visitors increased sharply to 562.71 million British pounds in 2013, but declined to 533.56 million British pounds in 2016. Spending by male visitors reached its maximum of 643.65 million British pounds in 2014, but declined sharply to 525.39 million British pounds in 2016.

The statistic presents information on the number of gaming brands advertising on TV in the United States in 2014 and 2015. According to the source's estimates, there were 64 gaming brands advertising on TV in 2015, up from 52 brands a year earlier.

The largest geothermal plant in the world is called the Geysers Geothermal Complex, located in the United States, with a capacity of 905 megawatts. It is made up of 22 power plants and spread over several kilometers, located north of San Francisco. It sits on top of a deep magma chamber that spans over 30 square miles. The United States also has one of the highest installed capacities of geothermal power in the world.
This statistic shows the number of people from the same sex in civil partnerships in Belgium from 2004 to 2014. The number increased from 985 in 2004 to 2,543 in 2014.

The statistic shows gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Bahrain from 1986 to 2020, with projections up until 2026. Gross domestic product ( GDP ) denotes the aggregate value of all services and goods produced within a country in any given year. GDP is an important indicator of a country's economic power. In 2020, Bahrain's gross domestic product amounted to around 34.62 billion U.S. dollars.

The statistic shows the ratio of government expenditure to gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Bahrain from 2016 to 2020, with projections up until 2026. In 2020, government expenditure in Bahrain amounted to about 35.21 percent of the country's gross domestic product.

As of November 2019, out of all matches of the national football team of Italy during the 2018/2019 season, the most attended one was against Croatia on the 22nd of May at the Stade de France in Paris. This match registered a total attendance of roughly 73.5 thousand spectators. The second most attended match of the national football team of Italy was against England on the 6th of June at Wembley Stadium. This game had a total attendance of approximately 53.2 thousand people.

8.5 million of the 10.38 million inhabitants in Sweden were born in Sweden. The second largest group of non- Swedes were people born in Asia, amounting to 748,000. The third largest group of non-Swedish inhabitants were born in the Nordic countries, including Finland, Denmark, and Norway.
This statistic shows the unemployment rate in Myanmar, also known as Burma, from 1999 to 2020. In 2020, the unemployment rate in Myanmar amounted to approximately 1.79 percent.

As of 2020, over 159 thousand students were registered at universities in Finland. The University of Helsinki had the most students with over 32 thousand, followed by the University of Tampere with nearly 27 thousand students.

This statistic shows the connected home products revenue in the United States from 2018 to 2022. In 2018, the revenue from connected home products in the U.S. amounted to 3.9 billion U.S. dollars and is projected to grow to 5.9 billion U.S. dollars in 2022.
This statistic shows the home security solutions sales in the United States from 2012 to 2017. In 2014, home security solutions sales amounted to 4.11 billion U.S. dollars.

In 2020, the largest group of male asylum seekers in Sweden came from Syria, with 652 men. The second and third most common countries of origin were Iraq and Afghanistan, with 582 and 407 asylum seekers respectively.

This statistic shows the total number of immigrants to the Netherlands from 2009 to 2019, by marital status. It reveals that the majority of the immigrants to the Netherlands in this period were unmarried.

The most common type of households in Sweden as of 2020 were single person households without children, which amounted to around 1.9 million. The second most common household type was cohabiting or married couples living without children, in around 1.13 million households.

This statistic shows the reported rate of violent crimes in Canada in 2020, by metro area. There were roughly 1,859.6 violent crimes reported per 100,000 residents in the Toronto area in Canada in 2020.

This statistic shows the gross weekly earnings of full-time employees in the tech industry in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015, by occupation. In that year, all workers in tech industry earned 796 British pounds a week on average.

A survey from April 2020 showed that during the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) lockdown about 41 percent of Italian people spent more time streaming audio and video content. However, 15 percent of them reported a significant increase, while four in ten respondents believed their time spent streaming audiovisual content remained unchanged.

This statistic shows the share of students, who changed the sector of education in Finland in 2016/17, broken down by gender. During the period under survey, a total of 1.5 percent of female students and 1.5 percent of male students changed the sector of education.

This statistic shows the share of students, who discontinued post-comprehensive school education in Finland in 2015, broken down by gender and sector of education. During the period under survey, out of all female students a share of 5.4 percent discontinued post-comprehensive school education at the university level.

This statistic shows the volume index of households'adjusted disposable income in Finland from 2007 to 2017. Throughout the survey period, the adjusted disposable income of households steadily increased on most years. In 2017, the volume index amounted to 103.5.
This statistic shows the distribution of oil and gas megaprojects facing cost overruns in 2014, by project type.

This statistic displays the results of a survey on the attendance of a potential Ukraine referendum in the Netherlands in February 2016, by EU position. During the survey period it was found that 27 percent of the respondents who were pro-EU were in favor of a Ukraine referendum.

This statistic displays the number of quarterly holiday nights from Canada in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015, by gender. The number of overnight stays by female holiday visitors increased from 105.1 thousand between January and March to 544.7 thousand between July and September 2015.

This statistic displays the number of quarterly holiday nights from Finland in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015, by gender. The number of overnight stays by female holiday visitors increased from 38.6 thousand between January and March to 131.2 thousand between July and September 2015.

The most populated county in Sweden as of January 1, 2021 was Stockholm, with 2.4 million inhabitants. The least populated county was Gotland, with around 127 thousand inhabitants. The population in Sweden has been growing annually and reached 10.38 million in 2019.

The average weekly price of jet fuel in the United States fluctuated considerably between October 2016 and January 2022. In October 2016, the average price of jet fuel stood at 1.52 U.S. dollars per gallon, while in January 2022, the price increased to 2.57 U.S. dollars per gallon.

The most common age for newlyweds in Sweden in 2021 was from 30 to 34 years of age, with around 18 thousand newlyweds. The second and third most common age groups for newlyweds were 25 to 29 year-olds, and 35 to 39 year-olds.

In 2021, the most searched fashion item online was the dress, with a search growth of 85 percent compared to the previous year. Shirts and trousers were the second and third most searched fashion items, with search growth of 60 and 53 percent, respectively. On the other hand, the search for stockings experienced a significant drop, with a search decrease of 33 percent from one year to another.
This statistic shows the most important export partner countries for Israel in 2020. In 2020, the most important export partner of Israel was the United States, with a share of 26 percent in exports.

This statistic displays the number of quarterly business nights from Ireland in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015, by gender. The number of overnight stays by female business visitors increased from 128.1 thousand between January and March to 95.7 thousand between April and June 2015.
This statistic shows the largest basins in Finland as of 2018, by area. The largest basin in Finland is the Kemijoki basin with an area of 5250 square kilometers.

According to the forecast, the population of Finland is expected to increase until 2060. The number of individuals aged 15 to 64 years is forecast to decrease slightly from 2020 to 2060, while the number of people aged 65 years and older is expected to increase. The number of children and youth is forecast to remain relatively stable.

This statistic displays the number of quarterly business nights from Poland in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015, by gender. The number of overnight stays by female business visitors increased from 134.2 thousand between January and March to 6.6 thousand between July and September 2015.

This statistic displays the average order value for personalized and social features of retailer apps by consumers in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015. In 2015, the average order value generated through retailers'apps with a set favorite store amounted to 79 British pounds.

This statistic displays the average browsing time spent on shopping features of retailer apps by consumers of the Poq platform in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015. In 2015, the average browsing time spent on full screen product zoom was 13.6 minutes.

The statistic shows Gabon's share in the global gross domestic product ( GDP ) adjusted for Purchasing Power Parity ( PPP ) from 2016 to 2026. In 2019, Gabon's share in the global gross domestic product adjusted for Purchasing Power Parity amounted to approximately 0.04 percent.

This statistic displays the number of quarterly nights during visits from Portugal to friends and family in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015, by gender. The number of overnight stays by female visitors increased from 198.6 thousand between January and March to 146.2 thousand between April and June 2015.
This statistic shows the total population of Gabon from 2016 to 2026. In 2020, the total population of Gabon was estimated at approximately 2.11 million inhabitants.

The most viewed video on the video streaming services in Poland in March 2020 was a daily news broadcast by TVN24. This is a significant increase compared to the figures for February 2020. The second most popular channel was TVN 24 Glos.

This statistic displays the number of quarterly nights during visits from New Zealand to friends and family in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015, by gender. The number of overnight stays by female visitors increased from 128.2 thousand between January and March to 203.2 thousand between April and June 2015.

This statistic displays the annual average expenditure per household in Belgium in 2020, by type of household. In 2020, a household with two adults and no children spent on average about 36,000 euros per year.

This statistic shows the number of visits by business travelers from Finland to the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2006 and 2017. Around 55.2 thousand business trips were made from Finland to the UK in 2017. In total, business trips to the UK from overseas accounted for approximately 8.8 million business trips in 2017.

This statistic shows the share of economic sectors in the gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Bhutan from 2009 to 2020. In 2020, the share of agriculture in Bhutan's gross domestic product was 19.39 percent, industry contributed approximately 34.39 percent and the services sector contributed about 45.23 percent.

This statistic illustrates the share of total management consultancy turnover attributable to strategy services in selected European countries in 2014 and 2017. It can be seen that the share of MC turnover attributable to strategy services in Germany was approximately 17 percent in 2017.

This statistic illustrates the distribution of the total management consultancy turnover in Italy between 2014 and 2017, broken down by service type. It can be seen that the largest share of MC turnover was attributable to finance, risk and strategy services in 2017, with a share of 19.8 percent.

This statistic shows the number of visits by business travelers from Poland to the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2006 and 2018. Around 828.8 thousand business trips were made from Poland to the UK in 2018. In total, business visitors from Poland made 8.8 million business trips to the UK in 2018.

This statistic illustrates the distribution of the total management consultancy turnover, by economic sector, in Europe from 2014 to 2017. It can be seen that the service sector accounted for the largest share of MC turnover in each of the years recorded here, with a share of 59 percent in 2017.

This statistic shows the national debt of Dominican Republic from 2016 to 2020 in relation to the gross domestic product ( GDP ), with projections up until 2026. The figures refer to the whole country and include the debts of the state, the communities, the municipalities and the social insurances. In 2020, the national debt of Dominican Republic amounted to approximately 71.54 percent of the GDP.
This statistic presents the number of holiday visits from Denmark to the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2006 and 2017. The number of holiday visitors peaked at 372 thousand in 2017.

The area occupied by permanent meadows and pastures in Costa Rica has been on a decline since the beginning of the 21st century. In 2016, approximately 12 thousand square kilometers of land in this Central American country were used to grow herbaceous forage crops, either cultivated or wild, for a period of at least five consecutive years. In 2000, the area amounted to more than 13.5 thousand square kilometers.

This statistic presents the leading purchase channels used by consumers to buy bathroom products for home improvement in Germany as of 2013. DIY stores were the preferred channel among German consumers, with 42 percent purchasing bathroom products from such stores.

This statistic presents quarterly holiday travel spending from Belgium in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015, by gender. Inbound holiday spending by female travelers increased from 19.73 million British pounds between January and March to 22.33 million British pounds between April and June.

This statistic presents the number of holiday visits from Spain to the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2006 and 2018. The number of holiday visitors peaked at 1.1 million in 2018. In 2016, the number of holiday visits reached its peak at 956 thousand.

This statistic represents the average annual estimates of the number of female college sports injuries in selected sports in the U.S. during fall season, for academic years 2009/2010 to 2013/2014. The 5-year average gives a total of 1,868 injuries in women's college lacrosse during fall season.

This statistic presents quarterly business travel spending from Spain in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015, by gender. Male travelers spent the most in the second quarter of that year, at 39.1 million British pounds, while female travelers spent the most in the first quarter, at 10.3 million British pounds.

This statistic presents quarterly business travel spending from Switzerland in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015, by gender. Inbound business spending by female travelers decreased from 6.19 million British pounds between January and March to 3.3 million British pounds between April and June.

This statistic presents the quarterly travel spending on visits to friends and family in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015, by gender. Female travelers spent 581 British pounds in the second quarter, compared to 438 British pounds in the previous one.

This statistic presents the quarterly travel spending on visits from Canada to friends and family in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015, by gender. Female travelers spent 34.7 million British pounds in the third quarter, compared to 10.8 million British pounds in the previous one.

This statistic presents quarterly travel spending on visits from Sweden to friends and family in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015, by gender. Female travelers spent 9.5 million British pounds in the third quarter, compared to 5.8 million British pounds in the previous one.

This statistic shows the number of votes each candidate received in the Democratic Party Idaho caucus held on March 22, 2016. As of March 23, 2016, the candidate with the highest number of votes was Bernie Sanders with 18,858 votes, roughly 66 percent.

A survey from April 2020 showed that during the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) lockdown about 65 percent of Italian people spent more time streaming audio and video content on YouTube. The share of respondents who increased their YouTube usage was much higher in the Islands ( 65 percent ) than in the North-West of the country ( 43 percent ).

The chart shows a comparison of GDP values in Asia and Europe from 2016 to 2026. In 2016, Asia had a GDP of 7,500 while Europe had a GDP of 18,000. This GDP of Asia increased steadily to reach 14,000 by 2020, then had a significant jump to 25,000 in 2021. Europe's GDP, on the other hand, decreased slightly from 18,000 in 2016 to 17,000 in 2020, then had a gradual increase to reach 34,000 by 2026.

This statistic shows the number of visits to friends and relatives from the Czech Republic to the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2006 and 2017. The number of visits from tourists peaked at 128 thousand in 2007. In 2017 the number of similar visits amounted to around 93 thousand.

The take-up rate for warehouses in the Netherlands fluctuated between 2014 and 2020, varying from approximately 29 percent to over 50 percent. The cities of Amsterdam, Rotterdam and The Hague saw the highest take-up rates in this period. In 2020, the take-up rate for warehouses in Amsterdam reached approximately 36 percent.

This statistic shows the religious participation in the Netherlands in 2018, by education level. It shows that in 2018, 83 percent of the respondents with a master or a doctorate degree participated in a religious service/meeting at least once a week.

This statistic shows the opinion of consumers on whether new pharmacies should be allowed to offer new services in the United States, as of January 2015. During the survey, 74 percent of heavy users said they thought new pharmacies should be allowed to offer new services.

This statistic presents travel spending on business visits among men from the Czech Republic to the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2010 and 2017. Spending by male visitors peaked at 34.33 million British pounds in 2015. In 2017, this spending amounted to 27.23 million British pounds.

This statistic shows the total area of wheat in hectares in the United Kingdom ( UK ) as of June 2017, by country. During this period there were approximately 1.7 million hectares of wheat grown in England.

In 2021, there were more than 220 thousand people in Sweden with a post-secondary education, and more than 220 thousand with an upper secondary education. Furthermore, there were more than 55 thousand people with a primary education. In total, there were more than 483 thousand self-employed people in Sweden in 2021.
This statistic displays the number of unemployed people in Belgium from 2008 to 2020, by gender. In 2020, approximately 126 thousand men were unemployed and about 127 thousand women were unemployed.

This statistic presents the SEA reach of leading mobile messenger apps in selected Southeast Asian countries as of December 2015. During the survey period, it was found that 93 percent of mobile users in Singapore accessed Facebook Messenger.

The number of deaths in Greenland fluctuated during the period from 2010 to 2020. The highest number of deaths was recorded in 2018, with a total of 544. The lowest number of deaths was in 2013, with a total of 442.

This statistic presents spending on business visits from France to the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2010 and 2017. Spending by business visitors peaked at 361.19 million British pounds in 2015. In 2017, this spending amounted to 341.33 million British pounds.
This statistic presents spending on business visits from Hungary to the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2010 and 2017. Spending by business visitors peaked at 37.19 million British pounds in 2017.

This statistic presents spending on business visits from Portugal to the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2010 and 2017. Spending by business visitors peaked at 60.82 million British pounds in 2015. In 2017, it amounted to 50.82 million British pounds.

This statistic shows the fertility rate in Kyrgyz Republic from 2009 to 2019. The fertility rate is the average number of children born by one woman while being of child-bearing age. In 2019, the fertility rate in Kyrgyz Republic amounted to 3.3 children per woman.
This statistic shows the life expectancy at birth in the Kyrgyz Republic from 2009 to 2019. In 2019, the average life expectancy at birth in the Kyrgyz Republic was 71.59 years.

This statistic shows the national debt of Montenegro from 2016 to 2020 in relation to the gross domestic product ( GDP ), with projections up until 2026. The figures refer to the whole country and include the debts of the state, the communities, the municipalities and the social insurances. In 2020, the national debt of Montenegro amounted to approximately 107.02 percent of the GDP.

This statistic shows the employment rate by age in Belgium from 2008 to 2020. In 2020, the employment rate for people aged between 15 and 24 was at approximately 24.7 percent, for people aged between 25 and 64 it was at roughly 80.7 percent and for people aged between 65 it was at approximately 61.5 percent.

The number of unemployed people in Finland fluctuated between around 180 and 250 thousand from 2011 to 2021. The number peaked in 2015 at 251 thousand, but decreased in the following years. In 2021, approximately 210.5 thousand people were unemployed in Finland.

This statistic shows the number of unemployed people in Finland from 2012 to 2017, by region. In 2017, the number of unemployed people in the capital region of Helsinki-Uusimaa amounted to 68 thousand.
This statistic shows consumer confidence in own economy in Finland monthly from September 2017 to September 2018. In September 2018, consumer confidence in own economy was measured at 10.1 points.

As of January 2020, the highest position in the ranking of Russian football regions was occupied by the Chechen Republic, which was followed by the Krasnodar Krai. The lowest rank was recorded by the Belgorod Oblast.

The majority of the people who emigrated from Greenland in 2020 had the Danish citizenship. Greenland is an autonomous region of Denmark, and the vast majority of the population of Greenland has a Danish citizenship. Because of this, both people originating from Greenland moving back home to Greenland as well as Danish people born in Denmark moving to Greenland are included in this statistic under `` Danish citizenship ''.

In 2021, the Consumer Price Index ( CPI ) inflation rate in the Netherlands increased by 2.7 percent, the highest rate since 2008. This was also the highest inflation rate reached since the financial crisis in 2008. Of the three Benelux countries, the Netherlands saw the lowest inflation. In 2018, the inflation rate was 2.3 percent in Belgium. Inflation in Luxembourg was only slightly lower.

The statistic shows the growth in real GDP in Djibouti from 2016 to 2018, with projections up until 2026. In 2018, Djibouti's real gross domestic product grew by around 8.46 percent compared to the previous year.

In 2020, the most common cause of death in Sweden was from accidents. More specifically, 1,078 people died from traffic accidents, while 531 people died from accidental poisoning. In total, 3,185 people died in Sweden in 2020.

The market value of publishing media in Finland fluctuated between 2010 and 2020. In 2020, the market value of daily newspapers was 675 million euros, while the corresponding figure for the previous year was 733 million euros. The market value of non-daily newspapers decreased from 2010 to 2020, but saw a slight increase in 2019. The market value of free distribution papers remained relatively stable, while magazines'and periodicals'market value declined.

In Sweden, more men than women died in traffic accidents in 2020. 569 men and 498 women died in traffic accidents in 2020. In comparison, more women than men died in poisoning that year, with 127 women and 375 men.

The statistic shows the ratio of government expenditure to gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Chad from 2016 to 2020, with projections up until 2026. In 2020, government expenditure in Chad amounted to about 18.94 percent of the country's gross domestic product.

This statistic shows the share of economic sectors in the gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Chad from 2010 to 2020. In 2020, the share of agriculture in Chad's gross domestic product was 46.59 percent, industry contributed approximately 13.01 percent and the services sector contributed about 44.1 percent.

This statistic shows the annual circulation numbers of selected large daily newspapers in Finland from 2013 to 2017. In 2017, the Helsingin Sanomat was the largest daily newspaper with a circulation of roughly 232 thousand. The circulation of the second largest daily newspaper, Turun Sanomat, amounted to roughly 90 thousand.

In 2020, income taxes made up the largest share of the government tax revenue in Finland. Income taxes accounted for nearly 35 billion euros of the total tax revenue, or roughly 40 percent. Taxes on goods and services made up nearly 33 billion euros, followed by social security contributions at around 27.5 billion euros.

In 2018, the average age of the population of Finland increased across the country. The average age of men was generally higher than that of women in Finland. The South Savo region had the largest difference of approximately four years ( men 45.7 years, women 44.7 years ). The average age of the population of Finland reached 40.4 years in 2018.

As of end-February 2020, nine drugs and vaccines were in clinical development targeting the coronavirus disease ( COVID-19 ). Of these, four were in the pre-human or pre-clinical phase, three were in the pre-vector phase, and two were in the pre-prophylactic phase. Prophylactic vaccines are expected to elicit an immune response similar to that seen with other viruses such as the human papillomavirus ( HPV ) vaccine.

As of 2020, the largest groups of non-Finnish speaking people in Finland lived in the capital region Uusimaa. There were roughly 1.3 million Finnish speakers, nearly 1.2 million Swedish speakers, and nearly 140 thousand speakers of other languages living in Uusimaa. In land, individuals with Swedish as their first language were the largest group with approximately 92 thousand inhabitants. The most Sami-speaking people, nearly 1,600, lived in the region of Lapland.

This statistic represents the operating income of Air Transport Services Group ( ATSG ), formerly known as Air Wisconsin Airlines, from the fiscal year of 2011 to the fiscal year of 2020. In the fiscal year of 2020, the American regional airline generated an operating income of over 204.5 million U.S. dollars.

This timeline displays the number of individuals reading print newspapers on a daily basis in the United Kingdom from 2003 to 2015, by newspaper title. In 2012, The Sun's print edition had the largest readership, with more than 10 million individuals reading the newspaper on a daily basis. The only newspaper to have survived the drastic reduction in print newspaper readership and still have a print edition is The Mail.

In 2022, the total defense budget in Finland was roughly 1.5 billion euros, increasing nearly 40 million euros from the previous year. The military budget accounted for the largest share of the defense budget with roughly 1.5 billion euros, increasing nearly 40 million euros from the previous year. The funds for police operations amounted to nearly 652 million euros, followed by funds for security operations at the borders of Finland at roughly 517 million euros.

As of March 2021, the defense budget accounted for 1.4 percent of the gross domestic product ( GDP ) of Finland. In the past decade, the defense budget share remained relatively stable, fluctuating between 1.3 and 1.5 percent. The highest share was measured in 2019 at 1.4 percent.
This statistic shows the fertility rate in Finland from 2010 to 2020. The fertility rate has declined in this time period from 1.9 children per woman in 2010 to 1.38 in 2020.

As of 2020, the largest share of asylum applicants in Finland were from Syria with 1,112 applications. The second largest share of asylum seekers came from Somalia with 468 applications, followed by Afghanistan with 346 applications.

This statistic shows the number of people who applied to Finnish universities in 2015, broken down by university. During the period under survey, the number of primary school graduates applying to university amounted to 65,813, of whom 17,813 applied to the University of Helsinki.

The number of adoptions in Finland fluctuated during the period from 2010 to 2020. The highest number of adoptions was recorded in 2010 with 486, and the lowest in 2020 with 295. Most adoptions in this period were of children from abroad.

China has the largest installed capacity of coal power plants in the world. As of January 2022, some 1,065 gigawatts of electricity were generated by the country's coal plants. This accounted for about 38 percent of the world's total coal power capacity.The United States and Japan ranked third and fourth in the list, with installed coal power capacity of 211 and 53.5 gigawatts, respectively.

Racial disparities exist in the U.S. regarding the level of concern about getting COVID-19 and being hospitalized. Among white adults, 33 percent were very concerned, whereas only 18 percent of black adults felt the same. This statistic shows the percentage of U.S. adults who were very or somewhat concerned about getting COVID-19 and being hospitalized as of April 12, 2020, by race.

This statistic displays the average value of private wealth per household in the Netherlands from 2006 to 2014. It shows that between 2006 and 2008 the average household wealth increased from approximately 156,000 to approximately 181,000 euros.

This statistic displays the inflation rate of health services and goods in Belgium from January 2018 to February 2022. In February 2022, the inflation rate for health services and goods was 0.84 percent.
This statistic shows the share of the population with a paid job in the Netherlands from 2006 to 2016. In 2016, the share of the population with a paid job was 64.4 percent.

The largest age group of LSS disability service recipients in Sweden in 2020 was from 20 to 44 years, reaching over 36 thousand recipients. This was followed by the age group from 45 to 64 years, with around 17 thousand recipients.

This statistic shows the reasons for mobile-first auto consumers in the United States to prefer desktop as of September 2015. During the survey, it was found that 40 percent of respondents preferred to use their mobile devices for watching videos on a manufacturer's website.
This statistic displays the inflation rate of recreation and culture in Belgium from January 2018 to February 2022. In February 2022, the inflation rate for recreation and culture was 2.6 percent.

This statistic displays the total number of eyes for breeding in the United Kingdom ( UK ) as of June 2017, by country. During this period there were approximately 6.3 million eyes for breeding in England.
This statistic presents the total number of poultry in the United Kingdom ( UK ) as of June 2017, by country. During this period there were approximately 1.3 million poultry in England.
This statistic shows the total number of goats and kids in the United Kingdom ( UK ) as of June 2017, by country. During this period there were approximately 85 thousand goats and kids in England.

This statistic shows the number of university of applied sciences applicants in Finland in 2020, broken down by institution. During the period under survey, the number of people in Finland applying to university of applied sciences amounted to 32,834, of whom the majority applied to Metropolia University of Applied Sciences ( 33,017 applicants ).

The highest growth in bankruptcies after the coronavirus outbreak in Sweden was registered in the trade in motor vehicles and in the hotel and restaurant industry. From February 2020 to February 2021, the number of bankruptcies in both industry increased by over 50 percent. The first case of the coronavirus in Sweden was confirmed on February 4, 2020. For further information about the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic, please visit our dedicated Facts and Figures page.

This statistic shows the annual volume of people who moved, raked, and/or harvested on holdings in Scotland from 2004 to 2014. The number of people moving, raked, and/or harvested on holdings fluctuated over the period, peaking in 2007 at 31 thousand.

This statistic displays the annual value of machinery expenses for the farming sector in Northern Ireland from 2010 to 2019. The annual value of machinery expenses increased over the time in consideration from 131.5 million British pounds in 2010 to 161 million British pounds in 2019.

This statistic displays the annual value of farm maintenance expenditure in Northern Ireland from 2010 to 2019. The annual value of expenditure has increased over the time in consideration from 46 million British pounds in 2010 to 52 million British pounds in 2019.

This statistic shows the harmonized index of consumer prices ( HICP ) for the transport sector in Belgium from January 2018 to July 2020. In July 2020, the harmonized consumer price index for the transport sector stood at 109.02.
This statistic shows the unemployment rate in Italy from 2008 to 2020. In 2020, the unemployment rate in Italy was around 9.31 percent.

This statistic shows the public perception of how well police enforce the law in Canada in 2014, separated by province or territory. In 2014, 68.1 percent of respondents in Quebec thought the police in their province did a good job of enforcing the law.

This statistic shows the distribution of freelance workers and the overall working population in the United States in 2019, by racial background. In 2019, about 15 percent of U.S. freelancers identified themselves as Hispanic or Latino.

The number of employees at APA Corporation has been decreasing over the years. In 2021, the company had 2,420 employees, down from 2,456 in the previous year. APA Corporation is a global provider of equipment, systems, and components as well as project management and aftermarket services for the oil and gas and process industries.

This statistic displays the consolidated production in the market sector from 2005 to 2015 in the Netherlands. It shows that in 2015, the consolidated production in the market sector was worth approximately 710 billion euros.

The number of elderly care services in Sweden was around 517,000 in 2019. The majority of the elderly care services were provided in home help services, amounting to around 236,000. Around 87,000 elderly people received special housing services, while around 8,000 were provided with short-term care.

According to a survey conducted in March 2020, around 58 percent of Japanese respondents trusted TV news the most for information related to the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ), followed by around 56 percent of respondents who trusted radio news the most.

The number of disabled persons receiving home help service in Sweden fluctuated from 2009 to 2019. The highest number during this period was reached in 2010, with 23,719 persons receiving the service. In 2019, there were 21,531 persons receiving home help service, which was an increase from the previous year.

This statistic displays the annual depreciation in consumption value of buildings and works in Northern Ireland from 2010 to 2019. The consumption value decreased from 2010 to 2017, before increasing slightly in the following years. In 2019, the consumption value amounted to approximately 1.14 billion British pounds.

The development of theft offences recorded by the police in Finland showed an upward trend from 1950 to 2020. In 2020, roughly 138.6 thousand theft offences were reported in Finland, increasing by almost four thousand from the previous year.

This statistic displays the total revenue of taxes on vehicles in Belgium from 2010 to 2019. The total revenue for taxes on vehicles decreased from about 1.9 billion euros in 2010 to roughly 215 million euros in 2019.
How many children were adopted in Sweden in 2020? The number of adoptions in Sweden has declined since 2010. In 2020, 16,131 adoptions were completed.
The statistic displayed above shows the total revenue of the insurance taxes in Belgium from 2010 to 2020. In 2020, the total revenue for the insurance taxes was about 2.9 billion euros.
In 2019, the number of companies in Italy engaged in social entrepreneurship amounted to 4.4 thousand. The number of companies in this category increased steadily since 2015.
The statistic shows the number of registered recreational boats in South Korea in 2014, by boat type. That year, there were 12,300 registered motor boats in South Korea.

This statistic shows the share of private consumption expenditure on recreation, culture and education in Finland from 2007 to 2017. The share spent on recreation, culture and education has declined over the given time period from 12.7 percent in 2007 to 11 percent in 2017.

This statistic displays the consolidated production of the IT- and information services industry in the Netherlands from 2004 to 2014 ( in million euros ). It shows that between 2004 and 2014 the annual worth of the production in this sector increased from 15.1 to 23.8 billion euros.

In 2020, the majority of Russian women surveyed for this study stated that they felt comfortable buying hygienic products separately. However, over 20 percent of respondents did not prefer to purchase separate hygiene products and preferred to buy them as a set.

This statistic shows the share of private consumption expenditure on furnishings and household maintenance in Finland from 2007 to 2017. The share of private consumption expenditure on furnishings and household maintenance has decreased over the given time period, amounting to 4.7 percent in 2017.

This statistic displays the consolidated production of the advertising, design and other business services industry in the Netherlands from 2004 to 2014 ( in million euros ). It shows that between 2004 and 2014 the annual production in this sector increased from 11.3 to 23.6 billion euros.

The graphic presents the annual revenue of the food industry in Italy in 2018, broken down by sector. According to data, the manufacturing of dairy products was the most valuable one, with a total revenue of 21.5 billion euros, followed by the production of cereals, which registered a value of 20.3 billion euros.

This statistic shows the annual averages of Harmonized Index of Consumer Prices ( HICP ) in Sweden from 2006 to 2016. During the time under consideration, the annual average of HICP increased from 101.68 in 2006 to 116.14 in 2016.

The statistic shows the annual turnover of the retail sale of food, beverages and tobacco in specialized stores in Switzerland from 2009 to 2018. In 2018 food, beverage and tobacco stores generated a total turnover of 1.8 billion euros through retail sales.

This statistic shows the average cost of syringe service programs ( SSPs ) for injection-drug users in rural and urban areas of the United States in 2013. The mean cost for an SSP in a rural area was 0.06 U.S. dollars per syringe.

This statistic shows the change in the popularity of the momentary favorability of saving money in Belgium from January 2018 to January 2022. In January 2022, the favorability score of saving money was slightly more negative than in the previous month.
The statistic shows the national debt of Mauritius from 2016 to 2020, with projections up until 2026. In 2020, the national debt of Mauritius amounted to around 10.06 billion U.S. dollars.

This statistic shows the share of persons in disguised unemployment in the age group from 45 to 54 years in Finland from 2007 to 2017. Throughout the survey period, the share of persons in disguised unemployment aged between 45 and 54 years increased by 0.6 percent. In 2017, the share amounted to 3.4 percent.

This statistic shows the share of persons in disguised unemployment in the age group from 55 to 64 years in Finland from 2007 to 2017. Throughout the survey period, the share of persons in disguised unemployment aged between 55 and 64 years increased by 0.6 percent. In 2017, the share amounted to 3.4 percent.

How many teachers are there in upper secondary school in Norway? During the time under consideration, the number of teachers fluctuated. The highest number of teachers in upper secondary school was in 2015, when there were 39,731 teachers. The number decreased the following year, and was down to 39,399 teachers in 2016. In 2017 and 2018, the number increased again, and amounted to 39,637 teachers in 2019.
The statistic shows the national debt of Panama from 2016 to 2020, with projections up until 2026. In 2020, the national debt of Panama amounted to around 35.62 billion U.S. dollars.
The statistic shows the national debt of Samoa from 2016 to 2020, with projections up until 2026. In 2020, the national debt of Samoa amounted to around 0.39 billion U.S. dollars.

The statistic shows the annual turnover of the retail sale of food, beverages and tobacco in specialized stores in Romania from 2008 to 2018. In 2018, food, beverages and tobacco stores generated a total turnover of one billion euros through retail sales.
The statistic shows the national debt of Switzerland from 2016 to 2019, with projections up until 2026. In 2019, the national debt of Switzerland amounted to around 313.72 billion U.S. dollars.

This statistic displays the consolidated intermediate consumption of the food and beverages industry in the Netherlands from 2004 to 2014. It shows that between 2004 and 2014 the annual intermediate consumption in the Dutch food and beverages industry was worth between 29.1 and 41.8 billion euros roughly.
This statistic shows the clearance rate of all recorded offences in Finland from 2013 to 2017. In 2017, the clearance rate of all offences was 58.5 percent.

This statistic displays the consolidated intermediate consumption of the wood and paper industry in the Netherlands in 2014 ( in million euros ) *. It shows that the majority of the intermediate consumption value in the Dutch wood and paper industry was spent on materials, amounting to roughly 3.9 billion euros.

In Sweden, more women than men are undertaking higher education. In 2020, around 235 thousand women and nearly 153 thousand men were registered in higher education institutions. Furthermore, there were around 172 thousand women and nearly 188 thousand men registered in upper secondary education, while there were roughly 133 thousand women and 107 thousand men registered in adult education.
This statistic shows the number of Buddhist Canadian residents in 2011, by the period in which they immigrated to Canada. Roughly 60,000 Buddhist immigrants came to Canada before 2001.
This statistic shows the number of Jewish Canadian residents in 2011, by the period in which they immigrated to Canada. Between 2001 and 2011, 21,600 Jewish immigrants came to Canada.

In 2020, due to the situation caused by the global coronavirus pandemic ( COVID-19 ), most Poles will not go on holiday within six months after the end of the epidemic. Every third respondent fears a new outbreak of the virus and therefore does not plan to travel. Every fifth researcher plans to go to the regions of the world where the risk of COVID-19 infection is minimum.
This statistic shows the number of Muslim Canadian residents in 2011, by the period in which they immigrated to Canada. Roughly 390,000 Muslim immigrants came to Canada between 2001 and 2011.

This statistic shows the number of independent retailers in Great Britain, by the number of store openings and closings from 2014 to 2017. In 2017, there were a total of 33,072 independent retailers in Great Britain. This figure included 33,072 new independent retailers opened, and 34,472 stores closed.

This statistic displays the consolidated intermediate consumption of the machinery industry in the Netherlands from 2004 to 2014. It shows that between 2004 and 2014 the annual intermediate consumption in the Dutch machinery industry was worth between 9.3 and 14.5 billion euros roughly.

In 2020, the majority of students in higher education in Sweden received both subsidies and loans ( 210,000 students ). Furthermore, there were 104,000 students who received no government student grants. The fewest students received subsidies but no loans ( 55,000 students ).

This statistic shows the unemployment and employment rates in Finland in 2017, by age group. The age group with the highest unemployment rate was 25 to 34 years with 7.9 percent, while the lowest rate of unemployment was measured in 45 to 54 years at 6.1 percent. The employment rate in the age group of 55 to 64 years was 63.2 percent.
Continental Resources employed 1,200 people in 2020, down from 1,250 people in 2019.

This statistic presents the average number of social media posts per company per week worldwide as of February 2015, by industry. During the survey period, it was found that leading consumer goods companies produced an average of 5.8 social media posts per company per week.

This statistic displays the consolidated intermediate consumption of the transportation and storage industry in the Netherlands from 2004 to 2014. It shows that between 2004 and 2014 the annual intermediate consumption in the Dutch transportation and storage sector was worth between 21.1 and 30.9 billion euros roughly.

This statistic shows the most expensive divorces among celebrities, ranked by estimated settlement amount, as of March 2016. Elin Nordegren received an estimated 1.68 billion U.S. dollars in her divorce from golf player, Phil Mickelson.
Eastman Chemical Company employed 14,630 people in 2020. This is a slight increase from the previous year, when 14,528 people were employed at the company.

The majority of respondents stated that they had enough masks, gloves, and hand sanitizers to protect themselves from the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ). However, one third of respondents answered that they did not have enough clothes sanitizers.

As of December 2021, Sony's PlayStation Plus had nearly 48 million subscribers worldwide. This marks a significant increase from the 25.5 million reported at the beginning of 2016. PlayStation Plus is an online subscription service associated with Sony's PlayStation line of consoles.

This statistic displays the consolidated intermediate consumption of the culture, sports and recreation sector in the Netherlands from 2004 to 2014. It shows that between 2004 and 2014 the annual intermediate consumption in this sector was worth between 4.3 and 5.1 billion euros roughly.

The largest group of inhabitants in Sweden with a higher education of three years or more was around 1.8 million in 2019. The second largest group with a higher education of three years or more was around 1.5 million, while the third largest group with a higher education of three years or more was around 1.2 million.

This statistic presents the share of U.S. adults who believe that advice from public health professionals is important for politicians in 2016 and 2021. According to the data, in 2021, 58 percent of respondents believed that advice from public health professionals is very important for politicians.

This statistic displays the quarterly revenue of the transportation and storage sector in Belgium from the first quarter of 2014 to the second quarter of 2020. In the first half of 2015, the revenue increased from about 12.1 billion euros in the first quarter to roughly 13.2 billion euros in the second quarter. In the second quarter of 2020, the revenue was approximately 11.9 billion euros.

The statistic shows the understanding of `` use by '' labelling on food products in the United Kingdom in 2015. During the interviews, 43 percent of the respondents agreed with the statement `` the food will be safe up to this date, but should not be eaten past this date ''.

This statistic displays the quarterly revenue for administrative services in Belgium from the first quarter of 2014 to the second quarter of 2020. In the first half of 2015, the revenue increased from about 9.5 billion euros in the first quarter to roughly 10.5 billion euros in the second quarter. In the second quarter of 2020, the revenue was approximately 12 billion euros.

This statistic displays the results of a survey on the participation in cliff climbing in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2014, by region. In 2014, it was found that 2.1 percent of the population in Wales participated in cliff climbing.

The statistic shows how often people in the United Kingdom use `` use by '' and `` best before '' dates on food labels when shopping and preparing meals in 2015. The majority of respondents ( 59 percent ) check these dates at least sometimes, 20 percent of respondents check them often.

This statistic shows the number of incoming foreign students in Sweden from 2010 to 2014, by region of origin. The number of foreign students in Sweden decreased from 2010 to 2012, but increased again in 2013 and 2014. In 2014, the number of foreign students from the EU, EEA and Switzerland amounted to 8,000 students.

According to a survey on the best Indian city to work for IT professionals in 2020, about 71 percent of the respondents chose Bengaluru for freshers to work with good salary and good package. It was noted during the survey that Bengaluru offered the best in everything that an IT professional aspired from their career perspective.

This statistic shows the quarterly revenue for the paper industry in Belgium from the first quarter of 2014 to the second quarter of 2020. In 2015, the revenue for the paper industry increased from about 1.3 billion euros in the first quarter to roughly 1.3 billion euros in the second quarter. In the second quarter of 2020, the revenue was approximately 1.1 billion euros.

This statistic displays the value added by the electrical equipment sector in the Netherlands from 2004 to 2014 ( in million euros ). It shows that between 2004 and 2014, the annual added value in this sector was valued at between 2 and 2.8 billion euros roughly.

This statistic shows the number of individuals belonging to other religious groups in Finland from 2008 to 2018. During the given time period, the number of individuals belonging to other religious groups remained stable at around 22,000.

This statistic shows the quarterly revenue for the production of electronic goods in Belgium from the first quarter of 2015 to the second quarter of 2020. In 2015, the revenue slightly decreased from about 973 million euros in the first quarter to roughly 963 million euros in the second quarter. In the second quarter of 2020, the revenue was approximately 830 million euros.

This statistic shows the number of accepted and rejected student applications for higher education in Sweden from 2009 to 2019. During the time under consideration, the number of accepted applications was higher than the number of rejected applications. In 2019, there were more than 126 thousand accepted applications, compared to nearly 61 thousand rejected applications.

This statistic displays the percentage change in the number of domestic flight searches for selected destinations in the United Kingdom ( UK ) and Ireland in 2015. Domestic flight searches for destinations in Northern Ireland increased by 631 percent, while those for destinations in Scotland increased by over 350 percent.

In 2020, the number of work days lost due to labor disputes in Finland amounted to approximately 177 thousand. This was a decrease of around 60 thousand from the previous year. The highest number of work days lost due to labor disputes was reported in 2018, at over 368 thousand.

This statistic shows the share of graduates in Sweden in 2013 and 2014, by age group. The age group with the largest share of graduates in Sweden in 2013 and 2014 was 25 to 29 year olds at 35 percent.

This statistic shows the number of vacancies in the construction industry in Finland from Q1 2015 to Q2 2018. In the second quarter of 2018, the construction industry in Finland had 6,400 open positions available.

This statistic displays the number of hours worked in the market sector in the Netherlands from 2005 to 2015 ( in million hours ). It shows that between 2005 and 2015, the annual number of hours worked in this sector differed from 10 to 11 million hours.

Rates of online purchase of household goods in Austria have remained relatively stable since 2016, ranging between 20 and 23 percent. The percentage of individuals to have purchased household goods online was at its highest in 2017, at 23 percent.

In the week ended May 29, 2020, the dollar sales of deli-prepared foods in the United States decreased by over forty percent compared to the same period of the previous year. The most affected products were sandwiches, with a dollar sales decrease of over 51 percent.

This statistic displays the results of a survey on the satisfaction of general practitioners with the current system of practicing medicine in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015. The majority of respondents - 53 percent - were satisfied with the current system of practicing medicine.

This statistic shows the results of a survey in which respondents were asked for their opinion on fruit snacks and whole foods in the United Kingdom in 2015. Of respondents, 44 percent think fruit snacks are healthier than sweets, while a further 39 percent believe they are healthier than sugar.

This statistic displays the total number of hours worked in the chemical industry in the Netherlands from 2004 to 2014 ( in million hours ). It shows that between 2004 and 2014, the annual number of hours worked in this sector differed from 71 to 83 million hours worked.

This statistic displays the total number of hours worked in the other manufacturing and repair sectors in the Netherlands from 2004 to 2014 ( in million hours ). It shows that between 2004 and 2014, the annual number of hours worked in this sector differed from 279 to 309 million hours.

This statistic shows the average daily TV viewing time per person in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2010 to 2014 with a forecast to 2025. In 2015, the average daily TV viewing time per person was 247 minutes. This number is projected to remain constant through 2025.

This statistic displays the total number of hours worked in the energy supply sector in the Netherlands from 2005 to 2015 ( in million hours ). It shows that between 2005 and 2015, the annual number of hours worked in this sector differed from 35 to 40 million hours.

The statistic shows gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Barbados'from 1986 to 2019, with projections up until 2026. Gross domestic product ( GDP ) denotes the aggregate value of all services and goods produced within a country in any given year. GDP is an important indicator of a country's economic power. In 2019, Barbados'gross domestic product amounted to around 4.66 billion international dollars.

This statistic shows the fertility rate in Barbados from 2009 to 2019. The fertility rate is the average number of children born by one woman while being of child-bearing age. In 2019, the fertility rate in Barbados amounted to 1.62 children per woman.

This statistic shows the annual number of persons going from labor market measures to labor market measures in Finland from 2007 to 2017. During the given time period the number of persons fluctuated. In 2017, approximately 7,600 job seekers where going from labor market measures to labor market measures.

This statistic displays the total number of hours worked in the culture, sports and recreation sector in the Netherlands from 2004 to 2014 ( in million hours ). It shows that between 2004 and 2014 the annual number of hours worked in this sector increased from 198 to 255 million hours.

In the state of So Paulo, Brazil, the largest losses in retail revenue during the COVID-19 pandemic were estimated at 25.8 billion Brazilian reals. The state of Minas Gerais, located in the Southeast region of the country, followed, with an estimated 9.1 billion reals in losses. As of April 2020, Brazil was the Latin American country with the largest number of confirmed cases of COVID-19.

This statistic shows the monthly number of long-term unemployed persons aged 15 to 24 years in Finland from September 2017 to September 2018. During the given time period the number of long-term unemployed in this age group has decreased. In September 2018, approximately 1,900 job seekers in this age group were considered as long-term unemployed.

The statistic displayed above shows the total wages of employees in the agriculture, forestry and fishing sector in the Netherlands from 2005 to 2015 ( in million euros ). In 2015, people employed in the Dutch agriculture, forestry and fishing sector together earned approximately 6.4 billion euros.

The number of men killed in violent crime cases was consistently higher than the number of women in Sweden from 2011 to 2020. In 2020, 98 men and 25 women were confirmed as homicide victims. That year, there were 762 homicides in total in Sweden.

Major League Baseball is a North American sports organization comprising two leagues with a total of 30 teams : the National League and the American League. The highest paid player in the MLB in 2021 was the center field for the Los Angeles Angels, David Glass. The 28-year old three-time All-Star took home an annual salary of 39.8 million U.S. dollars in the 2021 season.

This statistic shows the monthly number of repeatedly unemployed persons aged 35 to 44 years in Finland from October 2017 to October 2018. During the given time period the number of repeatedly unemployed in this age group remained relatively stable. In October 2018, approximately 6.8 thousand job seekers were considered as repeatedly unemployed.

The statistic displayed above shows the total wages of employees in the wood and paper industry in the Netherlands from 2004 to 2014 ( in million euros ). In 2014, people employed in the Dutch wood and paper industry together earned approximately 2.6 billion euros.

This statistic shows the number of Jewish Canadian citizens, permanent and non-permanent residents in 2011. Over 44,000 Canadian citizens, permanent and non-permanent residents under the age of 15 were Jewish in 2011.

In 2020, the highest number of people sentenced to imprisonment in Sweden were between 30 and 39 years old. Furthermore, the second largest age group was 25 to 29-year-olds, with 1,531 people. In total, 7,849 people were sentenced to imprisonment in Sweden in 2020.

This statistic shows the number of larynx cancer deaths in the United States from 1999 to 2018. The highest number of larynx cancer deaths in the given period was 3,869 in 2015, while the lowest number was 3,633 in 2007.

This statistic shows the number of employees affected by bankruptcy petitions against entrepreneurs and enterprises in Finland in 2017, broken down by industry. During the period under survey, the construction industry had the highest number of employees affected by bankruptcy petitions, amounting to 3,200 employees.

Most of the respondents stated that they visited their families during the emergency regime and the coronavirus epidemic ( COVID-19 ) in Romania. Friends visited only 13 percent of them, and only one percent were in contact with their boyfriend or girlfriend.

In 2020, theft crimes were the most reported crimes in Sweden, reaching 27 percent of all reported crimes. The second most common type of crime was crimes against people, with 19 percent of all reported crimes.

The statistic displayed above shows the total wages of employees in the construction sector in the Netherlands from 2005 to 2015 ( in million euros ). In 2015, people employed in the Dutch construction sector together earned approximately 27.7 billion euros.

This statistic displays the quarterly revenue for investigation and security services in Belgium from the first quarter of 2015 to the second quarter of 2020. In 2015 the revenue increased from about 300 million euros in the first quarter to approximately 317 million euros in the second quarter. In the second quarter of 2020, the revenue was approximately 340 million euros.

This statistic illustrates the annual revenue of the wholesale of food, beverages and tobacco in Italy from 2010 to 2018. The annual revenue of the wholesale of food, beverages and tobacco increased from 2010 to 2016, peaking at approximately 1.1 billion euros. After 2016, the annual revenue decreased, reaching about 1.08 billion euros in 2018.

The statistic displayed above shows the quarterly revenue for sports and recreation in Belgium from the first quarter of 2014 to the second quarter of 2020. In the first half of 2015, the revenue increased from about 533 million euros in the first quarter to roughly 633 million euros in the second quarter. In the second quarter of 2020, the revenue was approximately 380 million euros.

This statistic shows the religious affiliation of Canadian citizens, permanent and non-permanent residents of New Brunswick in 2011. Roughly 600,000 Canadian citizens, permanent and non-permanent residents of New Brunswick identified as Christian in 2011.

This statistic displays the results of a survey on the general practitioners'intentions to leave general practice in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015, by stress level. Of respondents, 76 percent of those who were extremely or very stressful said they intend to continue in medicine but leave general practice.

This statistic shows the results of a survey on the difficulty of general practitioners to coordinate care with social services in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015, by the level of stress. In this year, 54 percent of respondents said that they found it somewhat difficult to coordinate care with social services.

This statistic shows the religious affiliation of Canadian citizens, permanent and non-permanent residents of Manitoba in 2011. Roughly 800,000 Canadian citizens, permanent and non-permanent residents of Manitoba identified as Christian in 2011.

This statistic shows the religious affiliation of Canadian citizens, permanent and non-permanent residents of Yukon in 2011. Roughly 16,000 Canadian citizens, permanent and non-permanent residents of Yukon identified as Christian in 2011.

In March 2020, the total volume of goods transported in Poland amounted to over 48.6 million tons. The most significant drop in transport volume occurred in April, due to the coronavirus epidemic. In December, the volume of goods transported reached over 48.6 million tons.

The statistic displayed above shows the total wages of employees in the management and technical consultancy sector in the Netherlands from 2004 to 2014 ( in million euros ). In 2014, people employed in the Dutch management and technical consultancy sector together earned approximately 34 billion euros.

The annual revenue of the retail sale of food, beverages and tobacco in specialized stores Italy in 2018 was affected by the sector considered. According to the study, the total revenue amounted to 21.4 billion euros, with a high performance of the retail sale of beverages, which added up to 5.4 billion euros.
The value of exported goods from Sweden fluctuated from 2009 to 2020. The export value of goods was measured at around 1.4 trillion Swedish kronor in 2020.

This statistic shows the results of a 2015 survey asking individuals in the United Kingdom how easy or difficult they think it is to coordinate care with other providers and time spent doing administration work. The majority of respondents, 25 percent, reported that it is very difficult.

The value of monthly imports of goods into Sweden fluctuated from November 2019 to December 2021. The highest value of monthly imports of goods was in December 2021, when the value of imports was roughly 154 billion Swedish kronor. The lowest value of monthly imports of goods was in April 2020, when the value of imports was around 101 billion Swedish kronor.

The statistic shows the results of an evaluation of Tesco's performance according to shoppers in the United Kingdom in 2015. Tesco generally performed well, with 76 percent of shoppers rating a four or five for product quality and 67 percent rating a four or five for product availability.

This statistic presents the distribution of camping and caravanning trips taken in England in 2015, by region visited. The majority of camping and caravanning trips took place in the West of England, with 28 percent of such trips taken in this region.

This statistic shows the results of a survey on whether respondents to the United Kingdom would be more inclined to do more physical activity if the quality of life was improved in 2016. Of respondents, 50 percent tend to agree that they would be more inclined to do more physical activity if the quality of life was improved.

This statistic shows the percentage of aboriginal people in Canada who have had suicidal thoughts during their lifetime as of 2012. According to the survey, 23.7 percent of First Nations people have had suicidal thoughts during their lifetime.

This statistic shows the results of a survey on barriers to participation in sport, exercise and physical activity in Great Britain in 2015, by age. 14 percent of respondents between the ages of 18 to 24 said that a lack of motivation or poor attitude from staff at sports, clubs or gyms has been a barrier to their participation in sport, exercise and physical activity.

This statistic displays the number of whole blood and red blood cell units collected in the United States in 2019, distributed by collection site. In that year, around 9.4 million whole blood units were collected in blood centers in the country.

The value of crude materials imported into Sweden fluctuated from 2009 to 2020. The value of crude materials peaked in 2018 at 42.3 billion Swedish kronor. In 2020, the value of crude materials imported into Sweden was 38.1 billion Swedish kronor.

The chart illustrates the total revenue generated by the architectural and engineering activities sector in Italy from 2013 to 2018, broken down by activity. According to data, in 2018, the sector generated a revenue of approximately 22.7 billion euros through architectural activities, 20.7 billion euros through engineering activities, and 19.7 billion euros through technical consultancy and related services.

This source displays the value of the capital services per hour worked in the basic metals and fabricated metal products industry in the Netherlands from 2004 to 2014 ( in euros ). Between 2004 and 2014 the value of the capital services per hour worked in this sector varied between 7.10 and 9.70 euros per hour.

This statistic displays the registered cases of offences against the youth protection law in Belgium from 2008 to 2019. In 2019, approximately 16,100 offences against the youth protection law were registered in Belgium.

This statistic shows the results of a survey on how much time carers have to look after themselves after their caring activities in England in 2018/19. In this year, approximately 52 percent of the respondents stated that they have little or no time for themselves after their caring activities.

This source displays the value of the capital services per hour worked in the water supply and waste management sector in the Netherlands from 2005 to 2015 ( in euros ). Between 2005 and 2015 the value of the capital services per hour worked in this sector varied between 25.10 and 33.40 euros per hour.
This statistic displays the number of robberies under aggravating circumstances in Belgium from 2008 to 2019. In 2019, approximately 118,000 robberies were reported in Belgium.
This statistic shows the length of time individuals have been active in a career in England in 2018/19. Of respondents, 23.5 percent had been in their career for more than 20 years.

In 2020, there were 33 deaths in the British Army, compared with 42 in the previous year. During the provided time period, the mortality rate was highest in 2007, with over 130 deaths in the British Army.

This statistic represents Vinci's operating expenses from the fiscal year of 2012 to the fiscal year of 2019. In the fiscal year of 2019, the French concessions and construction company incurred around 43.5 billion euros in operating expenses.

A survey from April 2020 asked Italian individuals if they missed going to the cinema, theater, or music and movie festivals during the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) emergency. Data show that respondents from Generation Z were the most likely to miss going to the cinema or theater, with 72 percent of respondents.

This statistic displays the number of radiation therapy units in hospitals in Belgium from 2000 to 2017. The number of radiation therapy units in hospitals in Belgium increased from 131 in 2000 to 210 in 2017.

This statistic shows the volume index of manufactured computer, electronic and optical products in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2011 to 2017. The index was set at 100 in 2012. In 2017, the volume index of computer, electronic and optical products manufacturing was measured at 104.4.

This source displays the value of the capital services per hour worked in the advertising, design and other specialized business services sector in the Netherlands from 2004 to 2014 ( in euros ). Between 2004 and 2014 the value of the capital services per hour worked in this sector varied between 3.10 and 3.60 euros per hour.

The E. Leclerc Group was the leading supermarket chain in France for the 12 weeks ending on the March 21, 2021 with a market share of 20.3 percent. The Carrefour Group ranked second with a market share of 17.9 percent.

This statistic displays the number of specialist medical practitioners in Italy between 2009 and 2016. The number of specialist medical practitioners increased throughout this period to 185,834 in 2016.
This statistic displays the number of specialist medical practitioners in Ireland from 2006 to 2016. The number of specialist medical practitioners increased from 2,834 in 2006 to 6,865 in 2016.
This line graph shows the number of offenses to motor vehicles in Sweden from 2006 to 2016. The number of offenses decreased from 186,000 in 2006 to roughly 104,000 in 2016.

The graphic presents the annual revenue of gambling and betting activities in Italy from 2010 to 2019. In 2010, the revenue was around 9.2 billion euros, which increased to approximately 14.1 billion euros in 2019.

This source displays the total input of capital, labor, materials, energy and services in the other manufacturing and repair industry in the Netherlands from 2004 to 2014 ( in million euros ). Between 2004 and 2014, the total value of the annual input of the production factors in this sector varied between 14,0 and 16,8 billion euros roughly.

This statistic shows the number of unemployment benefit recipients in Finland in 2020, by type. At the end of 2020, roughly 195,000 persons received labor market subsidy benefits. Around 53,000 persons received basic unemployment allowance.

The outbreak of the coronavirus epidemic in Poland had a significant impact on Poles'shopping habits. Sixty-six percent of respondents expected to go grocery shopping more frequently in the future. Nearly every second Pole would do their shopping in pharmacies and drugstores more often.
The total expenditure on environmental protection in Sweden increased annually from 2010 to 2020. The expenditure peaked in 2020, when it reached approximately 21 billion Swedish kronor.

The figure shows the consumer expenditure on food in Spain from 2012 to 2016. According to the statistic, the projected expenditure on food in 2016 will increase by 1.1 percent in comparison to 2015, reaching 88.8 billion US dollars and showing slow signs of recovery.
